short_text: This Surah is entitled Ar Rahman, the word with which it begins. This title, however, deeply relates to the subject matter of the Surah too, for in it, from the beginning to the end, the manifestations and fruits of Allah's attribute of mercy and grace have been mentioned.
text:
This Surah is entitled Ar Rahman, the word with which it begins. This title, however, deeply relates to the subject matter of the Surah too, for in it, from the beginning to the end, the manifestations and fruits of Allah's attribute of mercy and grace have been mentioned.

Period of Revelation

The commentators generally hold the view that this is a Makki Surah, though according to some traditions which have been cited on the authority of Hadrat Abdullah bin Abbas, Ikrimah and Qatadah, it was revealed at Madinah. But, firstly, there are also some other traditions from these very authorities, which contradict this view; secondly, its subject matter bears a closer resemblance with the Makki Surahs than with the Madani Surahs; rather it appears to belong to the very early Makkah period. However, there are several authentic traditions which testify that it had been revealed in Makkah itself many years before the hijrah.

Musnad Ahmad contains a tradition from Hadarat Asma, daughter of Abu Bakr (may Allah bless them both), to the effect: "I saw the Messenger of Allah offering his Prayers in the sacred precincts of the Ka'bah facing the corner in which the "Black Stone" is fixed. This relates to the time when the Divine Command, fasda bi-ma tumar ("So, proclaim publicly, O Prophet, what you are being commanded") had not yet been revealed. The polytheists at that time were hearing the words, Fa-biayyi alaa'i Rabbi kuma tukadhdhi ban, being recited by him in the Prayer." This shows than this Surah had been sent down even before Surah Al-Hijr.

Al-Bazzar, Ibn Jarir, Ibn Al- Mundhir, Daraqutni (in Al Afrad), Ibn Marduyah and Ibn Al Khatib (in Al- Tarikh) have related, on the authority of Hadrat Abdullah bin Umar, that once the Holy Prophet (peace and blessings of Allah be upon him) recited Surah Ar-Rahman himself, or heard it recited before him : then he said to the people: How is it that I am not hearing from you the kind of good answer that the jinn had given to their Lord?When the people asked what it was he replied: "As I recited the Divine Words, Fa bi- ayyi alaa'i Rabbi-kuma tukadhdhiban, the jinn in response would repeat the words La bi shai'in min ni'mati Rabbi- na nukadhdhib : "We do not deny any of our Lord's blessings."

A similar theme has been related by Tirmidhi, Hakim and Hafiz Abu Bakr al-Bazzar from Hadrat Jabir bin Abdullah. Their tradition contains these words: "When the people kept silent on hearing the Surah Ar-Rahman, the Holy Prophet said 'I recited this very Surah before the jinn in the night when they had gathered together to hear the Qur'an. They responded to it better than you have. As I recited the Divine Words, Fa bi ayyi alaa'i Rabbikuma tukadhdhiban ("O jinn and men, which blessings of your Lord will you deny?") they would respond to it, saying: O our Lord, do not deny any of your blessings Praise is for You alone'!"

This tradition indicates that on the occasion of the incident that bas been related in Surah Al Ahqaf(vv. 29-32) of the jinn's hearing the Qur'an from the Holy Prophet (peace and blessings of Allah be upon him) he was reciting Surah Ar Rahman in the Prayer. This happened in the 10th year of the Prophethood when the Holy Prophet had halted at Makkah on his way back from Ta'if. Although in some other traditions it has been reported that the Holy Prophet did not know then that the jinn were hearing him recite the Qur'an, but afterwards Allah had informed him of this, it is not unreasonable to suppose that just as Allah had informed him of the jinn's hearing the Qur'an so also Allah Himself might have told him as to what answer they were giving on hearing Surah Ar Rahman.

These traditions only indicate that Surah Ar Rahman had been revealed even before Surahs Al-Hijr and Al-Ahqaf. Besides, we come across another tradition which shows that it is one of those Surahs which were the earliest Revelations at Makkah. Ibn Ishaq has related this on the authority of Hadrat Urwah bin Zubair: The Companions one day said to one another: "The Quraish have never heard any one recite the Qur'an publicly to them, and who would read out the Divine Word aloud to them Hadrat Abdullah bin Masud said that he would. The Companions expressed the apprehension that he might be subjected to a harsh treatment and said that it should better be done by a person of a powerful family, who would protect him if the Quraish tried to subject him to violence. Hadrat Abdullah said: 'Let me alone : my Protector is Allah.' So early next morning he went to the Ka'bah while the Quraish chiefs were sitting in their respective conferences. Hadrat Abdullah arrived at the Maqam (station of
Abraham) and began to recite Surah Ar- Rahman raising his voice as he did so. The Quraish first tried for a while to understand what he was saying. Then,when they realized that it was the Word that Muhammad (peace and blessings of Allah be upon him) was representing as the Word of God, they fell upon him and began to hit him in the face. But Hadrat Abdullah was not deterred : he continued to receive the slaps and to read the Qur'an as long as he could, At last, when he returned with a swollen face, the Companions said that they apprehended the same. He replied: 'God's enemies were never so light for me as they were today. If you say I'll recite the Qur'an to them again tomorrow.' They all said, 'No, you have done enough; you have made them listen to what they didn't want to bear.'" (Ibn Hisham, vol. 1, p. 336).

Theme and Subject Matter

This is the only Surah of the Qur'an in which besides men the jinn also, who are the other creation of the earth endowed with freedom of will and action, have been directly addressed, and both men and jinn have been made to realize the wonders of Allah's power, His countless blessings, their own helplessness and accountability before Him, and have been warned of the evil consequences of His disobedience and made aware of the best results of His obedience. Although at several other places in the Qur'an there are clear pointers to show that like the men the jinn too are a creation who have been endowed with freedom of will and action and are accountable, who have been granted the freedom of belief and unbelief, of obedience and disobedience, and among them too there are the believers and the unbelievers, the obedient and the rebellious, as among human beings, and among them too there exist such groups as have believed in the Prophets sent by God and in the Divine Books, this Surah
clearly points out that the message of the Holy Prophet (peace and blessings of Allah be upon him) and the Qur'an is meant both for men and for jinn and that his Prophethood is not restricted to human beings alone.

Although in the beginning of the Surah the address is directed only to human beings, for to them only belongs the vicegerency" of the earth, among them only have the Messengers of Allah been raised, and in their tongues only have the Divine Books been revealed, yet from verse 13 onward both the men and the jinn have been addressed and one and the same invitation has been extended to both.

The themes of the Surah have been couched in brief sentences in a specific sequence:

In vv. 1-4 it has been stated that the teaching of the Qur'an is from Allah Almighty and it is the very demand of His mercy that He should provide guidance to mankind through this teaching, for it is He Who has created man as a rational and intelligent being.

In vv. 5-6 it has been said that the whole system of the Universe is functioning under Allah's Sovereignty and everything in the earth and heavens is subject to His Command alone.

In vv. 7-9 another important truth that has been expressed is that Allah has established the entire system of the Universe precisely and equitably on justice, and the nature of this system requires that those who dwell in it also should adhere to justice within the bounds of their authority and should not disturb the balance.

In vv. 10-25 besides mentioning the wonders and excellences of Allah's might, references have been made to His those bounties from which the jinn and men are deriving benefit.

In vv. 26-30 both the men and the jinn have been reminded of the truths that in this Universe no one except One God is immortal and imperishable, and there is none, from the lowest to the highest, who does not stand in need of God for his survival and other requirements. Whatever is happening here, from the earth to the heavens, is happening under His administration and control.

In vv. 31-36 both the groups have been warned that the time is fast approaching when they will be called to account, which they will not be able to avoid, for God's Kingdom is encircling them from every side; it is not in their power to flee it; if they are involved in the misunderstanding that they can, they may try to do so.

In vv. 37-38 it has been said that this accountability will be held on the Day of Resurrection.

In vv. 39-45 the evil end of the guilty ones, from among men and jinn, who have been disobeying Allah in the world has been mentioned.

And from verse 46 to the end of the Surah mention has been made of those rewards and blessings which will be granted to the righteous men and jinn who have led pious lives in the world and lived with a clear understanding that they will have to appear before their Lord one day and render an account of their deeds and actions.

This whole discourse is couched in oratorical language. It is a spirited and eloquent address in the course of which after mentioning each of the wonders of Allah's great power, and each of the blessings bestowed by Him, and each of the manifestations of His Sovereignty and dominion, and each of the details of His punishment and rewards, the jinn and men have been over and over again questioned: "Which then of the bounties and favors of your Lord will you deny ?" Below we shall explain that alaa is a word with many shades of meaning, which has been used in different senses at different places in this discourse, and this question to the the jinn and men bears its own special meaning at every place according to the context.
description: The surah that crowns the Quran and opens with the chant of a single word proclaiming one of God’s most beautiful names, The All-Beneficent. It takes its name from verse 1 which mentions “the All-beneficent” (al-raḥmān). The surah highlights Gods wonders in this world, describes the end of the world, and paints an evocative picture of the delights of Paradise. Hell is briefly contrasted (verse 43 .) with the joys that await the righteous. The surah is characterized by the refrain “So which of your Lord’s bounties will you both deny?” which runs throughout. The surah divides mankind and jinn into three classes: the disbelievers (verse 41 .), the best of believers (verse 46 .), and the ordinary believers (verse 62 .).The surah is also known as: (God) Most Gracious, The All-Merciful, The Beneficent, The Lord of Mercy, The Merciful, The Mercy-giving, The Most Gracious.

Albanian.verse 55:4: ia ka mësuar të shprehurit (e mendimeve dhe ndjenjave).
Albanian.verse 55:5: Dielli dhe Hëna (lëvizin) sipas llogarisë (rrugës) së caktuar,
Albanian.verse 55:6: edhe bimët (e imëta) dhe drunjt i përulen (Perëndisë),
Albanian.verse 55:7: e qiellin e ka ngritur dhe ka vënë masë (drejtësinë),
Albanian.verse 55:8: për të mos kaluar (kufirin) në matje –
Albanian.verse 55:9: dhe matni drejt e mos mungoni në teresi!
Albanian.verse 55:10: Tokën e ka bërë (shtruar) për krijesa,
Albanian.verse 55:11: në të ka pemë të llojllojshme dhe hurme me frute (në gëzhojë),
Albanian.verse 55:12: dhe drithëra me gjethe dhe bimë me erë të mirë, -
Albanian.verse 55:13: e, cilat dhunti të Zotit tuaj (o njerëz dhe xhindë) po i përgënjeshtroni (mohoni)?!
Albanian.verse 55:14: Ai e krijoi njeriun prej baltës së thatë, ashtu siç është vorba e pjekur,
Albanian.verse 55:15: e xhindët i krijoi prej flakës së zjarrit –
Albanian.verse 55:16: e, cilat dhunti të Zotit tuaj po i përgënjeshtroni?!
Albanian.verse 55:17: (Ai është) Zoti i dy lindjee dhe i dy perëndimeve (dy solsticeve),
Albanian.verse 55:18: e, cilat dhunti të Zotit tuaj po i përgënjeshtroni?!
Albanian.verse 55:19: I ka lëshuar dy dete që të takohen,
Albanian.verse 55:20: e, në mes tyre ka stom (pengesë), andaj njëri nuk e mbizotëron tjetrin (nuk përzihen) –
Albanian.verse 55:21: e, cilat dhunti të Zotit tuaj po i përgënjeshtroni?!
Albanian.verse 55:22: Prej tyre nxirren margaritarë dhe korale (merxhanë) –
Albanian.verse 55:23: e, cilat dhunti të Zotit tuaj po i përgënjeshtroni?!
Albanian.verse 55:24: Atij i përkasin edhe anijet që lundrojnë nëpër dete dhe krijonë dallgë si malet,
Albanian.verse 55:25: e, cilat dhunti të Zotit tuaj po i përgënjeshtroni?!
Albanian.verse 55:26: Çdo gjë që është në Tokë është e kalueshme (do të shkatërrohet),
Albanian.verse 55:27: e mbetet vetëm Zoti yt, i Madhërueshmi dhe Bamirësi –
Albanian.verse 55:28: e, cilat dhunti të Zotit tuaj po i përgënjeshtroni?!
Albanian.verse 55:29: Prej Tij kërkojnë çka ka në qiej dhe në tokë; në çdo moment Ai është në gjendje (të krijojë, të shpërblejë, të zhdukë), -
Albanian.verse 55:30: e, cilat dhunti të Zotit tuaj po i përgënjeshtroni?!
Albanian.verse 55:31: Do t’ju qëllojmë juve (për shpërblim dhe llogari), o ju, dy barrët e Tokës (njerëzit dhe xhindët)?! -
Albanian.verse 55:32: e, cilat dhunti të Zotit tuaj po i përgënjeshtroni?!
Albanian.verse 55:33: O grpe të xhindëve dhe njerëzve, nëse mund të dilni prej kufijve të qiejve dhe të Tokës, dilni, por do të mund të dilni vetëm me fuqi të madhe (e këtë nuk e keni, andaj nuk mund të ikni)!
Albanian.verse 55:34: e, cilat dhunti të Zotit tuaj po i përgënjeshtroni?!
Albanian.verse 55:35: Kundër jush do të dërgohet flaka e zjarrit dhe bakër i shkrirë dhe ju nuk do të mund të mbroheni, -
Albanian.verse 55:36: e, cilat dhunti të Zotit tuaj po i përgënjeshtroni?!
Albanian.verse 55:37: E kur të çahet qielli dhe të bëhet i kuq si trëndafilja dhe si vaji i shkrirë,
Albanian.verse 55:38: e, cilat dhunti të Zotit tuaj po i përgënjeshtroni?!
Albanian.verse 55:39: atë Ditë njerëzit dhe xhindët nuk do të pyetën për mëkatet e tyre, -
Albanian.verse 55:40: e, cilat dhunti të Zotit tuaj po i përgënjeshtroni?!
Albanian.verse 55:41: e mëkatarët atëherë, do të njihen sipas pamjes (së fytyrës së tyre) dhe do të kapen për flokë (kacule) dhe për këmbë.
Albanian.verse 55:42: e, cilat dhunti të Zotit tuaj po i përgënjeshtroni?!
Albanian.verse 55:43: (Atyre u thuhet): “Ja, ky është xhehennemi të cilin e përgënjeshtronin mëkatarët!
Albanian.verse 55:44: Ata do të sillen në mes zjarrit dhe ujit të vëluar ë ka arritur shkallën më të lartë të vëlimit!
Albanian.verse 55:45: e, cilat dhunti të Zotit tuaj po i përgënjeshtroni?!
Albanian.verse 55:46: E, për ata që i druajnë paraqitjes para Zotit të vet, do të kenë dy xhennete,
Albanian.verse 55:47: e, cilat dhunti të Zotit tuaj po i përgënjeshtroni?!
Albanian.verse 55:49: e, cilat dhunti të Zotit tuaj po i përgënjeshtroni?!
Albanian.verse 55:50: në të ka burime që rrjedhin
Albanian.verse 55:51: e, cilat dhunti të Zotit tuaj po i përgënjeshtroni?!
Albanian.verse 55:52: në ta – prej çdo lloj peme, ka nga dy lloje, -
Albanian.verse 55:53: e, cilat dhunti të Zotit tuaj po i përgënjeshtroni?!
Albanian.verse 55:54: (ata do të jenë) të mbështetur në shtrojet, astari i të cilave është prej mëndafshi të trashë, e frytet e dy xhenneteve do të jenë të afërta (për t’i kapë me dorë),
Albanian.verse 55:55: e, cilat dhunti të Zotit tuaj po i përgënjeshtroni?!
Albanian.verse 55:56: Në ta, do të jenë ato (virxhëreshat), me sy ulur, të cilat – para tyre, nuk kanë pasur takim as me njerëz as me xhindë,
Albanian.verse 55:57: e, cilat dhunti të Zotit tuaj po i përgënjeshtroni?!
Albanian.verse 55:58: ato do të jenë si rubin (gurë të çmueshëm) dhe merxhanë (korale),
Albanian.verse 55:59: e, cilat dhunti të Zotit tuaj po i përgënjeshtroni?!
Albanian.verse 55:60: Vallë, për veprën e mirë, a ka tjetër shpërblim pos të mirë?!
Albanian.verse 55:61: e, cilat dhunti të Zotit tuaj po i përgënjeshtroni?!
Albanian.verse 55:62: E, nën këto dy (xhennete) janë edye dy xhennete (tjera), -
Albanian.verse 55:63: e, cilat dhunti të Zotit tuaj po i përgënjeshtroni?!
Albanian.verse 55:64: (Këta dy janë) të stolisur me gjelbërim,
Albanian.verse 55:65: e, cilat dhunti të Zotit tuaj po i përgënjeshtroni?!
Albanian.verse 55:66: në to janë dy burime (të përhershme) fiskishë (që hedhin lart ujin),
Albanian.verse 55:67: e, cilat dhunti të Zotit tuaj po i përgënjeshtroni?!
Albanian.verse 55:68: në to ka pemë, hurme dhe shega,
Albanian.verse 55:69: e, cilat dhunti të Zotit tuaj po i përgënjeshtroni?!
Albanian.verse 55:70: në to ka bukuroshe virtytesh të mrekullueshme,
Albanian.verse 55:71: e, cilat dhunti të Zotit tuaj po i përgënjeshtroni?!
Albanian.verse 55:72: hyritë (e xhennetit) të kufizuara më shatorra,
Albanian.verse 55:73: e, cilat dhunti të Zotit tuaj po i përgënjeshtroni?!
Albanian.verse 55:74: të cilat – para tyre, nuk kanë pasur takim as me njerëz as me xhindë, -
Albanian.verse 55:75: e, cilat dhunti të Zotit tuaj po i përgënjeshtroni?!
Albanian.verse 55:76: Ata do të rrinë mbështetur në shtroje të gjelbëra, të mrekullueshme dhe të bukura, -
Albanian.verse 55:77: e, cilat dhunti të Zotit tuaj po i përgënjeshtroni?!
Albanian.verse 55:78: Është i lartësuar emri i Zotit tënd, të Madhërueshëm dhe Bamirës!

Amharic.verse 55:11: በውስጧ እሸት ባለ ሺፋኖች የኾኑ ዘንባባዎችም ያሉባት ስትኾን፡፡
Amharic.verse 55:12: የገለባ ባለቤት የኾነ ቅንጣትም፡፡ ባለ መልካም መዐዛ ቅጠሎችም (ያሉባት ስትኾን)፡፡
Amharic.verse 55:13: (ሰዎችና ጋኔኖች ሆይ!) ከጌታችሁም ጸጋዎች በየትኛው ታስተባብላላችሁ?
Amharic.verse 55:14: ሰውን እንደ ሸክላ ከሚቅጨለጨል ደረቅ ጭቃ ፈጠረው፡፡
Amharic.verse 55:17: የሁለቱ ምሥራቆች ጌታ፤ የሁለቱ ምዕራቦችም ጌታ ነው፡፡
Amharic.verse 55:20: (እንዳይዋሐዱ) በመካከላቸው ጋራጅ አልለ፡፡ (አንዱ ባንዱ ላይ) ወሰን አያልፉም፡፡
Amharic.verse 55:24: እንደ ጋራዎች ኾነው በባሕር ውስጥ የተሠሩት ተንሻለዮቹም (ታንኳዎች) የእርሱ ናቸው፡፡
Amharic.verse 55:26: በእርሷ (በምድር) ላይ ያለው ሁሉ ጠፊ ነው፡፡
Amharic.verse 55:27: የልቅናና የልግሥና ባለቤት የኾነው የጌታህ ፊትም ይቀራል፡፡ (አይጠፋም)፡፡
Amharic.verse 55:29: በሰማያትና በምድር ውስጥ ያሉት ሁሉ ይለምኑታል፡፡ በየቀኑ ሁሉ እርሱ በሥራ ላይ ነው፡፡
Amharic.verse 55:31: እናንተ ሁለት ከባዶች (ሰዎችና ጋኔኖች) ሆይ! ለእናንተ (መቆጣጠር) በእርግጥ እናስባለን፡፡
Amharic.verse 55:33: የጋኔንና የሰው ጭፍሮች ሆይ! ከሰማያትና ከምድር ቀበሌዎች መውጣትን ብትችሉ ውጡ፡፡ በስልጣን እንጅ አትወጡም፡፡ (ግን ስልጣን የላችሁም)
Amharic.verse 55:35: በሁለታችሁም ላይ ከእሳት ነበልባል፣ ጭስም ይላክባችኋል፡፡ (ሁለታችሁም) አትርረዱምም፡፡
Amharic.verse 55:37: ሰማይም በተሰነጠቀችና እንደ ጽጌረዳ፣ እንደታረበ ቆዳ በኾነች ጊዜ፤ (ጭንቁን ምን አበረታው)፡፡
Amharic.verse 55:39: በዚያም ቀን ሰውም ጃንም ከኃጢኣቱ ገና አይጠየቅም፡፡
Amharic.verse 55:41: ከሓዲዎች በምልክታቸው ይታወቃሉ፡፡ አናቶቻቸውንና ጫማዎቻቸውንም ይያዛሉ፡፡
Amharic.verse 55:43: ይህቺ ያቺ አመጸኞች በእርሷ ያስተባብሉባት የነበረችው ገሀነም ናት (ይባላሉ)፡፡
Amharic.verse 55:44: በእርሷና በጣም ሞቃት በኾነ ፍል ውሃ መካከል ይመላለሳሉ፡፡
Amharic.verse 55:46: በጌታውም ፊት መቆምን ለፈራ ሰው ሁለት ገነቶች አልሉት፡፡
Amharic.verse 55:50: በሁለቱ ውስጥ የሚፈስሱ ሁለት ምንጮች አልሉ፡፡
Amharic.verse 55:52: በሁለቱ ውስጥ ከፍራፍሬዎች ሁሉ ሁለት ዓይነቶች (እርጥብና ደረቅ) አልሉ፡፡
Amharic.verse 55:54: የውስጥ ጉስጉሳቸው ከወፍራም ሐር በኾኑ ምንጣፎች ላይ የተመቻቹ ሲኾኑ (ይንፈላሰሳሉ)፡፡ የሁለቱም ገነቶች ፍሬ (ለለቃሚ) ቅርብ ነው፡፡
Amharic.verse 55:56: በውስጣቸው ከበፊታቸው (ከባሎቻቸው በፊት) ሰውም ጃንም ያልገሰሳቸው ዓይኖቻቸውን (በባሎቻቸው ላይ) አሳጣሪዎች (ሴቶች) አልሉ፡፡
Amharic.verse 55:60: የበጎ ሥራ ዋጋ በጎ እንጅ ሌላ ነውን?
Amharic.verse 55:62: ከሁለቱ ገነቶችም ሌላ ሁለት ገነቶች አልሉ፡፡
Amharic.verse 55:64: ከልምላሜያቸው የተነሳ ወደ ጥቁረት ያዘነበሉ ናቸው፡፡
Amharic.verse 55:70: በውስጣቸው ጠባየ መልካሞች መልክ ውቦች (ሴቶች) አልሉ፡፡
Amharic.verse 55:72: በድንኳኖች ውስጥ የተጨጎሉ የዓይኖቻቸው ጥቁረትና ንጣት ደማቅ የኾኑ ናቸው፡፡
Amharic.verse 55:76: በሚያረገርጉ አረንጓዴ ምንጣፎችና በሚያማምሩ ስጋጃዎች ላይ የተደላደሉ ሲኾኑ (ይቀመጣሉ)፡፡
Amharic.verse 55:78: የግርማና የመክበር ባለቤት የኾነው ጌታህ ስም ተባረከ፡፡

Arabic.verse 55:33: (ٍناَطْلُسِب اَّلِإ َنوُذُفنَت اَل ۚ اوُذُفناَف ِضْرَأْلاَو ِتاَواَمَّسلا ِراَطْقَأ ْنِم اوُذُفنَت نَأ ْمُتْعَطَتْسا ِنِإ ِسنِإْلاَو ِّنِجْلا َرَشْعَم اَي

Azerbaijani.verse 55:5: Günəş və ay müəyyən bir ölçü ilə hərəkət edir.
Azerbaijani.verse 55:6: Otlar da, ağaclar da səcdə edir.
Azerbaijani.verse 55:7: Allah göyü ucaltdı və tərəzini qoydu ki,
Azerbaijani.verse 55:9: Əşyaları tərəzidə insafla çəkin və çəkini əskiltməyin.
Azerbaijani.verse 55:11: Orada meyvələr və salxımlı xurma ağacları vardır.
Azerbaijani.verse 55:12: Həmçinin saçaqlı dənli bitkilər və xoş ətirli çiçəklər də vardır.
Azerbaijani.verse 55:13: Elə isə Rəbbinizin hansı nemətlərini yalan sayırsınız?
Azerbaijani.verse 55:14: O, insanı saxsı kimi quru gildən yaratdı,
Azerbaijani.verse 55:16: Elə isə Rəbbinizin hansı nemətlərini yalan sayırsınız?
Azerbaijani.verse 55:17: Allah iki məşriqin və iki məğribin Rəbbidir.
Azerbaijani.verse 55:18: Elə isə Rəbbinizin hansı nemətlərini yalan sayırsınız?
Azerbaijani.verse 55:19: O, qarşı-qarşıya gələn iki dənizi bir-birinə qovuşdurdu.
Azerbaijani.verse 55:20: Onların arasında maneə vardır, onu keçə bilməzlər.
Azerbaijani.verse 55:21: Elə isə Rəbbinizin hansı nemətlərini yalan sayırsınız?
Azerbaijani.verse 55:23: Elə isə Rəbbinizin hansı nemətlərini yalan sayırsınız?
Azerbaijani.verse 55:24: Dənizdə dağlar kimi, yelkənləri qaldırılmış halda üzən gəmilər də Onundur.
Azerbaijani.verse 55:25: Elə isə Rəbbinizin hansı nemətlərini yalan sayırsınız?
Azerbaijani.verse 55:26: Yer üzündə olan hər kəs ölümə məhkumdur.
Azerbaijani.verse 55:27: Ancaq Rəbbinin əzəmətli və kəramətli Üzü əbədidir.
Azerbaijani.verse 55:28: Elə isə Rəbbinizin hansı nemətlərini yalan sayırsınız?
Azerbaijani.verse 55:29: Göylərdə və yerdə olan hər kəs ehtiyacı olan şeyi Ondan diləyir. O hər gün bir işdədir.
Azerbaijani.verse 55:30: Elə isə Rəbbinizin hansı nemətlərini yalan sayırsınız?
Azerbaijani.verse 55:31: Ey ağır yükü olan insan və cin tayfası! Tezliklə ancaq sizinlə məşğul olacağıq.
Azerbaijani.verse 55:32: Elə isə Rəbbinizin hansı nemətlərini yalan sayırsınız?
Azerbaijani.verse 55:33: Ey cin və insan tayfası! Əgər göylərin və yerin hüdudlarını yarıb keçə bilərsinizsə, keçin! Siz ancaq qüdrət və qüvvətlə keçə bilərsiniz.
Azerbaijani.verse 55:34: Elə isə Rəbbinizin hansı nemətlərini yalan sayırsınız?
Azerbaijani.verse 55:35: Sizin üstünüzə tüstüsüz alov və ərimiş mis (və ya tüstü) göndəriləcək və siz bir-birinizə kömək edə bilməyəcəksiniz.
Azerbaijani.verse 55:36: Elə isə Rəbbinizin hansı nemətlərini yalan sayırsınız?
Azerbaijani.verse 55:37: Göy yarılıb dağ edilmiş yağ (yaxud ərinmiş qurğuşun) kimi qıpqırmızı olacaqdır.
Azerbaijani.verse 55:38: Elə isə Rəbbinizin hansı nemətlərini yalan sayırsınız?
Azerbaijani.verse 55:39: O gün nə insan, nə də cin günahı barəsində sorğu-sual olunmayacaqdır.
Azerbaijani.verse 55:40: Elə isə Rəbbinizin hansı nemətlərini yalan sayırsınız?
Azerbaijani.verse 55:41: Günahkarlar simalarından tanınacaq, kəkillərindən və ayaqlarından yaxalanacaqlar.
Azerbaijani.verse 55:42: Elə isə Rəbbinizin hansı nemətlərini yalan sayırsınız?
Azerbaijani.verse 55:43: Budur günahkarların yalan hesab etdikləri Cəhənnəm!
Azerbaijani.verse 55:44: Onlar onunla qaynar su arasında dolanacaqlar.
Azerbaijani.verse 55:45: Elə isə Rəbbinizin hansı nemətlərini yalan sayırsınız?
Azerbaijani.verse 55:46: Rəbbinin hüzurunda durmaqdan qorxanları iki Cənnət bağı gözləyir.
Azerbaijani.verse 55:47: Elə isə Rəbbinizin hansı nemətlərini yalan sayırsınız?
Azerbaijani.verse 55:48: İkisində də növbənöv meyvələrlə dolu budaqlar vardır.
Azerbaijani.verse 55:49: Elə isə Rəbbinizin hansı nemətlərini yalan sayırsınız?
Azerbaijani.verse 55:50: İkisində də iki axar bulaq vardır.
Azerbaijani.verse 55:51: Elə isə Rəbbinizin hansı nemətlərini yalan sayırsınız?
Azerbaijani.verse 55:52: İkisində də hər meyvədən qoşa-qoşa vardır.
Azerbaijani.verse 55:53: Elə isə Rəbbinizin hansı nemətlərini yalan sayırsınız?
Azerbaijani.verse 55:54: Onlar orada astarları atlazdan olan döşəklərə dirsəklənəcəklər. Hər iki bağın meyvələri onlara yaxın olacaqdır.
Azerbaijani.verse 55:55: Elə isə Rəbbinizin hansı nemətlərini yalan sayırsınız?
Azerbaijani.verse 55:56: Orada gözlərini öz ərlərinə dikmiş, onlardan əvvəl özlərinə heç bir insan və cin toxunmamış qızlar vardır.
Azerbaijani.verse 55:57: Elə isə Rəbbinizin hansı nemətlərini yalan sayırsınız?
Azerbaijani.verse 55:59: Elə isə Rəbbinizin hansı nemətlərini yalan sayırsınız?
Azerbaijani.verse 55:61: Elə isə Rəbbinizin hansı nemətlərini yalan sayırsınız?
Azerbaijani.verse 55:62: Bu ikisindən başqa daha iki Cənnət bağı da vardır.
Azerbaijani.verse 55:63: Elə isə Rəbbinizin hansı nemətlərini yalan sayırsınız?
Azerbaijani.verse 55:65: Elə isə Rəbbinizin hansı nemətlərini yalan sayırsınız?
Azerbaijani.verse 55:66: İkisində də fəvvarə vuran iki bulaq vardır.
Azerbaijani.verse 55:67: Elə isə Rəbbinizin hansı nemətlərini yalan sayırsınız?
Azerbaijani.verse 55:68: İkisində də cürbəcür meyvələr, xurma ağacları və nar vardır.
Azerbaijani.verse 55:69: Elə isə Rəbbinizin hansı nemətlərini yalan sayırsınız?
Azerbaijani.verse 55:70: Orada xoş xasiyyətli, gözəl qızlar vardır.
Azerbaijani.verse 55:71: Elə isə Rəbbinizin hansı nemətlərini yalan sayırsınız?
Azerbaijani.verse 55:72: Çadırlarda gözlərini öz ərlərinə dikmiş hurilər vardır.
Azerbaijani.verse 55:73: Elə isə Rəbbinizin hansı nemətlərini yalan sayırsınız?
Azerbaijani.verse 55:74: Onlardan əvvəl özlərinə heç bir insan və cin toxunmamış qızlar vardır.
Azerbaijani.verse 55:75: Elə isə Rəbbinizin hansı nemətlərini yalan sayırsınız?
Azerbaijani.verse 55:76: Onlar yaşıl balışlara və gözəl döşəkcələrə dirsəklənəcəklər.
Azerbaijani.verse 55:77: Elə isə Rəbbinizin hansı nemətlərini yalan sayırsınız?
Azerbaijani.verse 55:78: Sənin əzəmət və kərəm sahibi olan Rəbbinin adı nə qədər mübarəkdir.

Bengali.verse 55:6: এবং তৃণলতা ও বৃক্ষাদি সেজদারত আছে।
Bengali.verse 55:7: তিনি আকাশকে করেছেন সমুন্নত এবং স্থাপন করেছেন তুলাদন্ড।
Bengali.verse 55:8: যাতে তোমরা সীমালংঘন না কর তুলাদন্ডে।
Bengali.verse 55:9: তোমরা ন্যায্য ওজন কায়েম কর এবং ওজনে কম দিয়ো না।
Bengali.verse 55:10: তিনি পৃথিবীকে স্থাপন করেছেন সৃষ্টজীবের জন্যে।
Bengali.verse 55:11: এতে আছে ফলমূল এবং বহিরাবরণবিশিষ্ট খর্জুর বৃক্ষ।
Bengali.verse 55:12: আর আছে খোসাবিশিষ্ট শস্য ও সুগন্ধি ফুল।
Bengali.verse 55:13: অতএব, তোমরা উভয়ে তোমাদের পালনকর্তার কোন কোন অনুগ্রহকে অস্বীকার করবে?
Bengali.verse 55:14: তিনি মানুষকে সৃষ্টি করেছেন পোড়া মাটির ন্যায় শুষ্ক মৃত্তিকা থেকে।
Bengali.verse 55:15: এবং জিনকে সৃষ্টি করেছেন অগ্নিশিখা থেকে।
Bengali.verse 55:16: অতএব, তোমরা উভয়ে তোমাদের পালনকর্তার কোন কোন অনুগ্রহ অস্বীকার করবে?
Bengali.verse 55:17: তিনি দুই উদয়াচল ও দুই অস্তাচলের মালিক।
Bengali.verse 55:18: অতএব, তোমরা উভয়ে তোমাদের পালনকর্তার কোন কোন অবদানকে অস্বীকার করবে?
Bengali.verse 55:19: তিনি পাশাপাশি দুই দরিয়া প্রবাহিত করেছেন।
Bengali.verse 55:20: উভয়ের মাঝখানে রয়েছে এক অন্তরাল, যা তারা অতিক্রম করে না।
Bengali.verse 55:21: অতএব, তোমরা উভয়ে তোমাদের পালনকর্তার কোন কোন অবদানকে অস্বীকার করবে?
Bengali.verse 55:22: উভয় দরিয়া থেকে উৎপন্ন হয় মোতি ও প্রবাল।
Bengali.verse 55:23: অতএব, তোমরা উভয়ে তোমাদের পালনকর্তার কোন কোন অবদানকে অস্বীকার করবে?
Bengali.verse 55:25: অতএব, তোমরা উভয়ে তোমাদের পালনকর্তার কোন কোন অবদানকে অস্বীকার করবে?
Bengali.verse 55:27: একমাত্র আপনার মহিমায় ও মহানুভব পালনকর্তার সত্তা ছাড়া।
Bengali.verse 55:28: অতএব, তোমরা উভয়ে তোমাদের পালনকর্তার কোন কোন অবদানকে অস্বীকার করবে?
Bengali.verse 55:29: নভোমন্ডল ও ভূমন্ডলের সবাই তাঁর কাছে প্রার্থী। তিনি সর্বদাই কোন না কোন কাজে রত আছেন।
Bengali.verse 55:30: অতএব, তোমরা উভয়ে তোমাদের পালনকর্তার কোন কোন অবদানকে অস্বীকার করবে?
Bengali.verse 55:31: হে জিন ও মানব! আমি শীঘ্রই তোমাদের জন্যে কর্মমুক্ত হয়ে যাব।
Bengali.verse 55:32: অতএব, তোমরা উভয়ে তোমাদের পালনকর্তার কোন কোন অবদানকে অস্বীকার করবে?
Bengali.verse 55:33: হে জিন ও মানবকূল, নভোমন্ডল ও ভূমন্ডলের প্রান্ত অতিক্রম করা যদি তোমাদের সাধ্যে কুলায়, তবে অতিক্রম কর। কিন্তু ছাড়পত্র ব্যতীত তোমরা তা অতিক্রম করতে পারবে না।
Bengali.verse 55:34: অতএব, তোমরা উভয়ে তোমাদের পালনকর্তার কোন কোন অবদানকে অস্বীকার করবে?
Bengali.verse 55:35: ছাড়া হবে তোমাদের প্রতি অগ্নিস্ফুলিঙ্গ ও ধুম্রকুঞ্জ তখন তোমরা সেসব প্রতিহত করতে পারবে না।
Bengali.verse 55:36: অতএব, তোমরা উভয়ে তোমাদের পালনকর্তার কোন কোন অবদানকে অস্বীকার করবে?
Bengali.verse 55:37: যেদিন আকাশ বিদীর্ণ হবে তখন সেটি রক্তবর্ণে রঞ্জিত চামড়ার মত হয়ে যাবে।
Bengali.verse 55:38: অতএব, তোমরা উভয়ে তোমাদের পালনকর্তার কোন কোন অবদানকে অস্বীকার করবে?
Bengali.verse 55:39: সেদিন মানুষ না তার অপরাধ সম্পর্কে জিজ্ঞাসিত হবে, না জিন।
Bengali.verse 55:40: অতএব, তোমরা উভয়ে তোমাদের পালনকর্তার কোন কোন অবদানকে অস্বীকার করবে?
Bengali.verse 55:41: অপরাধীদের পরিচয় পাওয়া যাবে তাদের চেহারা থেকে; অতঃপর তাদের কপালের চুল ও পা ধরে টেনে নেয়া হবে।
Bengali.verse 55:42: অতএব, তোমরা উভয়ে তোমাদের পালনকর্তার কোন কোন অবদানকে অস্বীকার করবে?
Bengali.verse 55:43: এটাই জাহান্নাম, যাকে অপরাধীরা মিথ্যা বলত।
Bengali.verse 55:44: তারা জাহান্নামের অগ্নি ও ফুটন্ত পানির মাঝখানে প্রদক্ষিণ করবে।
Bengali.verse 55:45: অতএব, তোমরা উভয়ে তোমাদের পালনকর্তার কোন কোন অবদানকে অস্বীকার করবে?
Bengali.verse 55:46: যে ব্যক্তি তার পালনকর্তার সামনে পেশ হওয়ার ভয় রাখে, তার জন্যে রয়েছে দু’টি উদ্যান।
Bengali.verse 55:47: অতএব, তোমরা উভয়ে তোমাদের পালনকর্তার কোন কোন অবদানকে অস্বীকার করবে?
Bengali.verse 55:49: অতএব, তোমরা উভয়ে তোমাদের পালনকর্তার কোন কোন অবদানকে অস্বীকার করবে?
Bengali.verse 55:50: উভয় উদ্যানে আছে বহমান দুই প্রস্রবন।
Bengali.verse 55:51: অতএব, তোমরা উভয়ে তোমাদের পালনকর্তার কোন কোন অবদানকে অস্বীকার করবে?
Bengali.verse 55:52: উভয়ের মধ্যে প্রত্যেক ফল বিভিন্ন রকমের হবে।
Bengali.verse 55:53: অতএব, তোমরা উভয়ে তোমাদের পালনকর্তার কোন কোন অবদানকে অস্বীকার করবে?
Bengali.verse 55:54: তারা তথায় রেশমের আস্তরবিশিষ্ট বিছানায় হেলান দিয়ে বসবে। উভয় উদ্যানের ফল তাদের নিকট ঝুলবে।
Bengali.verse 55:55: অতএব, তোমরা উভয়ে তোমাদের পালনকর্তার কোন কোন অবদানকে অস্বীকার করবে?
Bengali.verse 55:56: তথায় থাকবে আনতনয়ন রমনীগন, কোন জিন ও মানব পূর্বে যাদের ব্যবহার করেনি।
Bengali.verse 55:57: অতএব, তোমরা উভয়ে তোমাদের পালনকর্তার কোন কোন অবদানকে অস্বীকার করবে?
Bengali.verse 55:59: অতএব, তোমরা উভয়ে তোমাদের পালনকর্তার কোন কোন অবদানকে অস্বীকার করবে?
Bengali.verse 55:60: সৎকাজের প্রতিদান উত্তম পুরস্কার ব্যতীত কি হতে পারে?
Bengali.verse 55:61: অতএব, তোমরা উভয়ে তোমাদের পালনকর্তার কোন কোন অবদানকে অস্বীকার করবে?
Bengali.verse 55:62: এই দু’টি ছাড়া আরও দু’টি উদ্যান রয়েছে।
Bengali.verse 55:63: অতএব, তোমরা উভয়ে তোমাদের পালনকর্তার কোন কোন অবদানকে অস্বীকার করবে?
Bengali.verse 55:65: অতএব, তোমরা উভয়ে তোমাদের পালনকর্তার কোন কোন অবদানকে অস্বীকার করবে?
Bengali.verse 55:67: অতএব, তোমরা উভয়ে তোমাদের পালনকর্তার কোন কোন অবদানকে অস্বীকার করবে?
Bengali.verse 55:68: তথায় আছে ফল-মূল, খর্জুর ও আনার।
Bengali.verse 55:69: অতএব, তোমরা উভয়ে তোমাদের পালনকর্তার কোন কোন অবদানকে অস্বীকার করবে?
Bengali.verse 55:71: অতএব, তোমরা উভয়ে তোমাদের পালনকর্তার কোন কোন অবদানকে অস্বীকার করবে?
Bengali.verse 55:73: অতএব, তোমরা উভয়ে তোমাদের পালনকর্তার কোন কোন অবদানকে অস্বীকার করবে?
Bengali.verse 55:74: কোন জিন ও মানব পূর্বে তাদেরকে স্পর্শ করেনি।
Bengali.verse 55:75: অতএব, তোমরা উভয়ে তোমাদের পালনকর্তার কোন কোন অবদানকে অস্বীকার করবে?
Bengali.verse 55:76: তারা সবুজ মসনদে এবং উৎকৃষ্ট মূল্যবান বিছানায় হেলান দিয়ে বসবে।
Bengali.verse 55:77: অতএব, তোমরা উভয়ে তোমাদের পালনকর্তার কোন কোন অবদানকে অস্বীকার করবে?
Bengali.verse 55:78: কত পূণ্যময় আপনার পালনকর্তার নাম, যিনি মহিমাময় ও মহানুভব।

Berber Amazigh.verse 55:7: Igenni, Issuli t; Issers ed lmizan.
Berber Amazigh.verse 55:9: Weznet s tidep, ur ssexsaôet lmizan.
Berber Amazigh.verse 55:13: Anwa seg i$iten n Mass nnwen ara teskiddben, i sin?
Berber Amazigh.verse 55:14: Ixleq amdan si talaxt, am ujeqduô.
Berber Amazigh.verse 55:15: Ixleq loenn seg ujajiê n tmessi.
Berber Amazigh.verse 55:16: Anwa seg i$iten n Mass nnwen ara teskiddben, i sin?
Berber Amazigh.verse 55:17: Mass n sin igmav, Mass n sin ituram.

Berber Amazigh.verse 55:22: Teff$ent ed, segsen, tyuqat akked lmeôoan.

Berber Amazigh.verse 55:24: IneS lembwabeô pwabnan di yill, am idurar.

Berber Amazigh.verse 55:27: A d igwri udem n Mass ik, Bab n ccan akked cciâa.

Berber Amazigh.verse 55:29: Teppren T, yal ass, kra illan di tmurt akked igenwan, Neppa la Ixelleq.
Berber Amazigh.verse 55:30: Anwa seg i$iten n Mass nnwen ara teskiddben, i sin?
Berber Amazigh.verse 55:31: A d Nelhi yidwen, a sin iéayanen!
Berber Amazigh.verse 55:32: Anwa seg i$iten n Mass nnwen ara teskiddben, i sin?
Berber Amazigh.verse 55:33: A yagraw n leonun akked imdanen, ma tzemrem a pzegrem akin i tmurt akked igenwan, zegret! Ur tepzeggirem siwa ma s udabu.
Berber Amazigh.verse 55:34: Anwa seg i$iten n Mass nnwen ara teskiddben, i sin?

Berber Amazigh.verse 55:41: Ibe$wviyen, a d banen ar ccwami nnsen. Ad pwaîîfen seg icebbuben akked ivaôen.

Berber Amazigh.verse 55:44: Ad ddewwiôen garas akked wayen ippayzagen.
Berber Amazigh.verse 55:45: Anwa seg i$iten n Mass nnwen ara teskiddben, i sin?
