Bosnian.verse 55:5: Sunce i Mjesec utvrđenim putanjama plove,
Bosnian.verse 55:6: i trava i drveće se pokoravaju,
Bosnian.verse 55:7: a nebo je digao. I postavio je terazije
Bosnian.verse 55:8: da ne prelazite granice u mjerenju –
Bosnian.verse 55:9: i pravo mjerite i na teraziji ne zakidajte!
Bosnian.verse 55:10: A Zemlju je za stvorenja razastro,
Bosnian.verse 55:11: na njoj ima voća i palmi sa plodom u čaškama
Bosnian.verse 55:12: i žita sa lišćem i miomirisna cvijeća –
Bosnian.verse 55:13: pa, koju blagodat Gospodara svoga poričete?!
Bosnian.verse 55:14: On je čovjeka od sasušene ilovače, kao što je grnčarija, stvorio
Bosnian.verse 55:16: pa, koju blagodat Gospodara svoga poričete?! –
Bosnian.verse 55:17: Gospodara dva istoka i dva zapada –
Bosnian.verse 55:18: pa, koju blagodat Gospodara svoga poričete?!
Bosnian.verse 55:19: Pustio je dva mora da se dodiruju,
Bosnian.verse 55:20: između njih je pregrada i ona se ne miješaju –
Bosnian.verse 55:21: pa, koju blagodat Gospodara svoga poričete?!
Bosnian.verse 55:22: Iz njih se vadi biser i merdžan –
Bosnian.verse 55:23: pa, koju blagodat Gospodara svoga poričete?!
Bosnian.verse 55:24: Njegove su i lađe koje se kao brda visoko po moru uzdižu –
Bosnian.verse 55:25: pa, koju blagodat Gospodara svoga poričete?!
Bosnian.verse 55:26: Sve što je na Zemlji prolazno je,
Bosnian.verse 55:27: ostaje samo Gospodar tvoj, Veličanstveni i Plemeniti –
Bosnian.verse 55:28: pa, koju blagodat Gospodara svoga poričete?!
Bosnian.verse 55:29: Njemu se mole oni koji su na nebesima i na Zemlji; svakog časa On se zanima nečim –
Bosnian.verse 55:30: pa, koju blagodat Gospodara svoga poričete?!
Bosnian.verse 55:31: Polagaćete Mi račun, o ljudi i džini –
Bosnian.verse 55:32: pa, koju blagodat Gospodara svoga poričete?!
Bosnian.verse 55:33: O družine džina i ljudi, ako možete da preko granica nebesa i Zemlje prodrete, prodrite, moći ćete prodrijeti jedino uz veliku moć! –
Bosnian.verse 55:34: pa, koju blagodat Gospodara svoga poričete?!
Bosnian.verse 55:35: Na vas će se ognjen plamen i rastopljeni mjed prolivati, i vi se nećete moći odbraniti –
Bosnian.verse 55:36: pa, koju blagodat Gospodara svoga poričete?!
Bosnian.verse 55:37: A kad se nebo razdvoji i kao ucvrkan zejtin rumeno postane –
Bosnian.verse 55:38: pa, koju blagodat Gospodara svoga poričete?! –
Bosnian.verse 55:39: tog Dana ljudi i džini za grijehe svoje neće biti pitani –
Bosnian.verse 55:40: pa, koju blagodat Gospodara svoga poričete?!
Bosnian.verse 55:41: a grješnici će se po biljezima svojim poznati, pa će za kike i noge ščepani biti –
Bosnian.verse 55:42: pa, koju blagodat Gospodara svoga poričete?!
Bosnian.verse 55:43: "Evo, to je Džehennem koji su grješnici poricali!"
Bosnian.verse 55:44: I između vatre i ključale vode oni će kružiti –
Bosnian.verse 55:45: pa, koju blagodat Gospodara svoga poričete?!
Bosnian.verse 55:46: A za onoga koji se stajanja pred Gospodarom svojim bojao, biće dva perivoja –
Bosnian.verse 55:47: pa, koju blagodat Gospodara svoga poričete?! –
Bosnian.verse 55:49: pa, koju blagodat Gospodara svoga poričete?! –
Bosnian.verse 55:50: u kojima će biti dva izvora koja će teći –
Bosnian.verse 55:51: pa, koju blagodat Gospodara svoga poričete?! –
Bosnian.verse 55:52: u njima će od svakog voća po dvije vrste biti –
Bosnian.verse 55:53: pa, koju blagodat Gospodara svoga poričete?!
Bosnian.verse 55:54: Odmaraće se na posteljama čije će postave od kadife biti, a plodovi u oba perivoja nadohvat ruke će stajati –
Bosnian.verse 55:55: pa, koju blagodat Gospodara svoga poričete?!
Bosnian.verse 55:56: U njima će biti one koje preda se gledaju, one koje, prije njih, ni čovjek ni džin nije dodirnuo –
Bosnian.verse 55:57: pa, koju blagodat Gospodara svoga poričete?!
Bosnian.verse 55:59: pa, koju blagodat Gospodara svoga poričete?!
Bosnian.verse 55:60: Zar nagrada za dobro učinjeno djelo može biti nešto drugo do dobro?! –
Bosnian.verse 55:61: pa, koju blagodat Gospodara svoga poričete?!
Bosnian.verse 55:62: Osim ta dva, biće još dva neznatnija perivoja –
Bosnian.verse 55:63: pa, koju blagodat Gospodara svoga poričete?! –
Bosnian.verse 55:65: pa, koju blagodat Gospodara svoga poričete?! –
Bosnian.verse 55:66: sa izvorima koji prskaju, u svakom –
Bosnian.verse 55:67: pa, koju blagodat Gospodara svoga poričete?!
Bosnian.verse 55:68: u njima će biti voća, i palmi, i šipaka –
Bosnian.verse 55:69: pa, koju blagodat Gospodara svoga poričete?!
Bosnian.verse 55:70: u njima će biti ljepotica naravi divnih –
Bosnian.verse 55:71: pa, koju blagodat Gospodara svoga poričete?! –
Bosnian.verse 55:73: pa, koju blagodat Gospodara svoga poričete?! –
Bosnian.verse 55:74: koje prije njih ni čovjek ni džin nije dodirnuo –
Bosnian.verse 55:75: pa, koju blagodat Gospodara svoga poričete?!
Bosnian.verse 55:76: Oni će biti naslonjeni na uzglavlja zelena, prekrivena ćilimima čarobnim i prekrasnim –
Bosnian.verse 55:77: pa, koju blagodat Gospodara svoga poričete?!
Bosnian.verse 55:78: Neka je uzvišeno ime Gospodara tvoga, Veličanstvenog i Plemenitog!

Bulgarian.verse 55:5: Слънцето и луната - [се движат] по изчисление,
Bulgarian.verse 55:6: и звездите, и дърветата се прекланят.
Bulgarian.verse 55:7: И въздигна Той небето, и положи везните,
Bulgarian.verse 55:9: И отмервайте справедливо, и не ощетявайте в мярката!
Bulgarian.verse 55:10: И положи Той земята за тварите.
Bulgarian.verse 55:11: На нея има плодове и палми с обвити гроздове,
Bulgarian.verse 55:12: и зърно с плява, и уханни растения.
Bulgarian.verse 55:13: Та кои блага на вашия Господ взимате за лъжа?
Bulgarian.verse 55:14: Сътвори Той човека от звънка глина като грънчарско изделие.
Bulgarian.verse 55:15: И сътвори Той джиновете от пламъка на огъня.
Bulgarian.verse 55:16: Та кои блага на вашия Господ взимате за лъжа?
Bulgarian.verse 55:17: Господа на двата изгрева и Господа на двата залеза.
Bulgarian.verse 55:18: Та кои блага на вашия Господ взимате за лъжа?
Bulgarian.verse 55:19: Пусна Той двете морета да се срещнат,
Bulgarian.verse 55:20: но между тях има преграда, която не престъпват.
Bulgarian.verse 55:21: Та кои блага на вашия Господ взимате за лъжа?
Bulgarian.verse 55:22: От двете излизат бисери и корали.
Bulgarian.verse 55:23: Та кои блага на вашия Господ взимате за лъжа?
Bulgarian.verse 55:24: И Негови са плаващите кораби, въздигнали се като планини в морето.
Bulgarian.verse 55:25: Та кои блага на вашия Господ взимате за лъжа?
Bulgarian.verse 55:27: Но пребъдва Ликът на твоя Господ, Владетеля на величието и почитта.
Bulgarian.verse 55:28: Та кои блага на вашия Господ взимате за лъжа?
Bulgarian.verse 55:29: Умолява Го всичко на небесата и на земята. Всеки миг изявява Той някакво дело.
Bulgarian.verse 55:30: Та кои блага на вашия Господ взимате за лъжа?
Bulgarian.verse 55:31: Ще ви направим равносметка, о, два свята [на джинове и хора]!
Bulgarian.verse 55:32: Та кои блага на вашия Господ взимате за лъжа?
Bulgarian.verse 55:33: О, множество от джинове и хора, ако можете да проникнете зад пределите на небесата и на земята, проникнете! Не ще проникнете освен с власт [от Нас].
Bulgarian.verse 55:34: Та кои блага на вашия Господ взимате за лъжа?
Bulgarian.verse 55:35: Ще бъде пратен срещу вас пламък от огън и дим, и не ще ви се помогне.
Bulgarian.verse 55:36: Та кои блага на вашия Господ взимате за лъжа?
Bulgarian.verse 55:37: И когато небето се разцепи, и стане червено като разтопено масло...
Bulgarian.verse 55:38: Та кои блага на вашия Господ взимате за лъжа?
Bulgarian.verse 55:39: В този Ден не ще бъде питан за греха му нито човек, нито джин.
Bulgarian.verse 55:40: Та кои блага на вашия Господ взимате за лъжа?
Bulgarian.verse 55:41: Престъпниците ще бъдат разпознати по техния белег. И ще бъдат хванати за перчема и за краката.
Bulgarian.verse 55:42: Та кои блага на вашия Господ взимате за лъжа?
Bulgarian.verse 55:43: Това е Адът, който престъпниците взимат за лъжа.
Bulgarian.verse 55:44: Те ще обикалят между него и вряща, кипяща вода.
Bulgarian.verse 55:45: Та кои блага на вашия Господ взимате за лъжа?
Bulgarian.verse 55:46: А за онзи, който се страхува да застане пред своя Господ, има две Градини -
Bulgarian.verse 55:47: та кои блага на вашия Господ взимате за лъжа?
Bulgarian.verse 55:49: Та кои блага на вашия Господ взимате за лъжа?
Bulgarian.verse 55:51: Та кои блага на вашия Господ взимате за лъжа?
Bulgarian.verse 55:52: Там от всеки плод има по два вида.
Bulgarian.verse 55:53: Та кои блага на вашия Господ взимате за лъжа?
Bulgarian.verse 55:54: Облегнати върху килими с подплата от брокат. И плодовете на двете градини ще са близо.
Bulgarian.verse 55:55: Та кои блага на вашия Господ взимате за лъжа?
Bulgarian.verse 55:56: Има там жени с целомъдрен поглед, недокоснати нито от човек преди тях, нито от джин.
Bulgarian.verse 55:57: Та кои блага на вашия Господ взимате за лъжа?
Bulgarian.verse 55:59: Та кои блага на вашия Господ взимате за лъжа?
Bulgarian.verse 55:60: Нима въздаянието за добрината е друго освен добрина?
Bulgarian.verse 55:61: Та кои блага на вашия Господ взимате за лъжа?
Bulgarian.verse 55:62: И освен тях - още две градини
Bulgarian.verse 55:63: та кои блага на вашия Господ взимате за лъжа?
Bulgarian.verse 55:65: Та кои блага на вашия Господ взимате за лъжа?
Bulgarian.verse 55:66: В тях има два бликащи извора.
Bulgarian.verse 55:67: Та кои блага на вашия Господ взимате за лъжа?
Bulgarian.verse 55:68: Там има плодове и палми, и нарове.
Bulgarian.verse 55:69: Та кои блага на вашия Господ взимате за лъжа?
Bulgarian.verse 55:70: Там има добродетелни и прекрасни жени -
Bulgarian.verse 55:71: та кои блага на вашия Господ взимате за лъжа?
Bulgarian.verse 55:73: та кои блага на вашия Господ взимате за лъжа?
Bulgarian.verse 55:74: недокоснати нито от човек преди тях, нито от джин...
Bulgarian.verse 55:75: Та кои блага на вашия Господ взимате за лъжа?
Bulgarian.verse 55:76: Облегнати върху зелени възглавници и хубави килими...
Bulgarian.verse 55:77: Та кои блага на вашия Господ взимате за лъжа?
Bulgarian.verse 55:78: Благословено да е името на твоя Господ, Владетеля на величието и почитта!

Chinese.verse 55:5: 日月是依定数而运行的。
Chinese.verse 55:6: 草木是顺从他的意旨的。
Chinese.verse 55:7: 他曾将天升起。他曾规定公平，
Chinese.verse 55:9: 你们应当秉公地谨守衡度，你们不要使所称之物分量不足。
Chinese.verse 55:10: 他为众生而将大地放下。
Chinese.verse 55:11: 大地上有水果，和有花篦的海枣，
Chinese.verse 55:13: 你们究竟否认你们的主的哪一件恩典呢？
Chinese.verse 55:14: 他曾用陶器般的干土创造人，
Chinese.verse 55:16: 你们究竟否认你们的主的哪一件恩典呢？
Chinese.verse 55:17: 他是两个东方的主，也是两个西方的主。
Chinese.verse 55:18: 你们究竟否认你们的主的哪一件恩典呢？
Chinese.verse 55:19: 他曾任两海相交而会合，
Chinese.verse 55:20: 两海之间，有一个堤坊，两海互不侵犯。
Chinese.verse 55:21: 你们究竟否认你们的主的哪一件恩典呢？
Chinese.verse 55:22: 他从两海中取出大珍珠和小珍珠。
Chinese.verse 55:23: 你们究竟否认你们的主的哪一件恩典呢？
Chinese.verse 55:24: 在海中桅帆高举，状如山峦的船舶，只是他的。
Chinese.verse 55:25: 你们究竟否认你们的主的哪一件恩典呢？
Chinese.verse 55:26: 凡在大地上的，都要毁灭；
Chinese.verse 55:27: 惟有你的主的本体，具有尊严与大德，将永恒存在。
Chinese.verse 55:28: 你们究竟否认你们的主的哪一件恩典呢？
Chinese.verse 55:29: 凡在天地间的都仰求他；他时时都有事物。
Chinese.verse 55:30: 你们究竟否认你们的主的哪一件恩典呢？
Chinese.verse 55:31: 精灵和人类啊！我将专心应付你们。
Chinese.verse 55:32: 你们究竟否认你们的主的哪一件恩典呢？
Chinese.verse 55:33: 精灵和人类的群众啊！如果你们能通过天地的境界，你们就通过吧！你们必须凭据一种权柄，才能通过。
Chinese.verse 55:34: 你们究竟否认你们的主的哪一件恩典呢？
Chinese.verse 55:35: 火焰和火烟将被降于你们，而你们不能自卫。
Chinese.verse 55:36: 你们究竟否认你们的主的哪一件恩典呢？
Chinese.verse 55:37: 当天破离的时候，天将变成玫瑰色，好象红皮一样。
Chinese.verse 55:38: 你们究竟否认你们的主的哪一件恩典呢？
Chinese.verse 55:39: 在那日，任何人和精灵都不因罪过而受审问。
Chinese.verse 55:40: 你们究竟否认你们的主的哪一件恩典呢？
Chinese.verse 55:41: 犯罪者将因他们的形迹而被认识，他们的额发将被系在脚掌上。
Chinese.verse 55:42: 你们究竟否认你们的主的哪一件恩典呢？
Chinese.verse 55:43: 这是犯罪者所否认的火狱。
Chinese.verse 55:44: 他们将往来于火狱和沸水之间。
Chinese.verse 55:45: 你们究竟否认你们的主的哪一件恩典呢？
Chinese.verse 55:46: 凡怕站在主的御前受审问者，都得享受两座乐园。
Chinese.verse 55:47: 你们究竟否认你们的主的哪一件恩典呢？
Chinese.verse 55:48: 那两座乐园，是有各种果树的。
Chinese.verse 55:49: 你们究竟否认你们的主哪一件恩典呢？
Chinese.verse 55:50: 在那两座乐园里，有两洞流行的泉源。
Chinese.verse 55:51: 你们究竟否认你们的主的哪一件恩典呢？
Chinese.verse 55:52: 在那两座乐园里，每种水果，都有两样。
Chinese.verse 55:53: 你们究竟否认你们的主的哪一件恩典呢？
Chinese.verse 55:54: 他们靠在用锦缎做里子的坐褥上，那两座乐园的水果，都是手所能及的。
Chinese.verse 55:55: 你们究竟否认你们的主的哪一件恩典呢？
Chinese.verse 55:56: 在那些乐园中，有不视非礼的妻子，在他们的妻子之前，任何人和任何精灵都未与她们交接过。
Chinese.verse 55:57: 你们究竟否认你们的主的哪一件恩典呢？
Chinese.verse 55:58: 她们好象红宝石和小珍珠一样。
Chinese.verse 55:59: 你们究竟否认你们的主的哪一件恩典呢？
Chinese.verse 55:61: 你们究竟否认你们的主的哪一件恩典呢？
Chinese.verse 55:62: 次于那两座乐园的，还有两座乐园。
Chinese.verse 55:63: 你们究竟否认你们的主的哪一件恩典呢？
Chinese.verse 55:64: 那两座乐园都是苍翠的。
Chinese.verse 55:65: 你们究竟否认你们的主的哪一件恩典呢？
Chinese.verse 55:66: 在那两座乐园里，有两洞涌出的泉源。
Chinese.verse 55:67: 你们究竟否认你们的主的哪一件恩典呢？
Chinese.verse 55:68: 在那两座乐园里，有水果，有海枣，有石榴。
Chinese.verse 55:69: 你们否认你们的主的哪一件恩典呢？
Chinese.verse 55:70: 在那些乐园里，有许多贤淑佳丽的女子。
Chinese.verse 55:71: 你们究竟否认你们的主的哪一件恩典呢？
Chinese.verse 55:72: 他们是白皙的，是蛰居于帐幕中的。
Chinese.verse 55:73: 你们究竟否认你们的主的哪一件恩典呢？
Chinese.verse 55:74: 在他们的妻子之前，任何人或精灵，都未曾与她们交接过。
Chinese.verse 55:75: 你们究竟否认你们的主的哪一件恩典呢？
Chinese.verse 55:76: 他们靠在翠绿的坐褥和美丽的花毯上。
Chinese.verse 55:77: 你们究竟否认你们的主的哪一件恩典呢？
Chinese.verse 55:78: 多福哉，你具尊严和大德的主的名号！

Danish.verse 55:4: En heeft hem de uiteenzetting (er van) geleerd
Danish.verse 55:5: De zon en de maan doorlopen hun banen volgens het plan
Danish.verse 55:6: En planten en bomen aanbidden Hem
Danish.verse 55:7: Hij heeft de hemel hoog er boven verheven en een evenwicht bepaald
Danish.verse 55:8: Opdat gij het evenwicht niet zoudt verstoren
Danish.verse 55:9: Houdt de weegschaal naar recht en doet aan de maat niet tekort
Danish.verse 55:10: En Hij heeft de aarde voor Zijn schepselen gemaakt
Danish.verse 55:11: Daarop zijn vruchten en palmbomen met scheden
Danish.verse 55:12: En gebolsterd graan en geurige bloemen
Danish.verse 55:13: Welke van de gunsten van uw Heer wilt gij dan ontkennen
Danish.verse 55:14: Hij schiep de mens uit droge klei, als aardewerk
Danish.verse 55:15: En Hij schiep de djinn uit de vlam van Vuur
Danish.verse 55:16: Welke van de gunsten van uw Heer wilt gij dan ontkennen
Danish.verse 55:17: De Heer der twee Oosten en de Heer der twee Westen
Danish.verse 55:18: Welke van de gunsten van uw Heer wilt gij dan ontkennen
Danish.verse 55:19: Hij heeft de twee zeeën gescheiden, die elkander eens zullen ontmoeten
Danish.verse 55:20: Daartussen is een versperring geplaatst welke zij niet kunnen passeren
Danish.verse 55:21: Welke van de gunsten van uw Heer wilt gij dan ontkennen
Danish.verse 55:22: Er komen paarlen en koraal uit beide (zeeën) vandaan
Danish.verse 55:23: Welke van de gunsten van uw Heer wilt gij dan ontkennen
Danish.verse 55:24: En van Hem zijn de bergenhoge schepen op zee
Danish.verse 55:25: Welke van de gunsten van uw Heer wilt gij dan ontkennen
Danish.verse 55:27: En er blijft alleen het Aangezicht van uw Heer, de Bezitter van Heerlijkheid en Eer
Danish.verse 55:28: Welke van de gunsten van uw Heer uilt gij dan ontkennen
Danish.verse 55:29: Van Hem smeken allen, die in de hemelen en op aarde zijn, (gunsten) af. Elk dag toont Hij een andere Heerlijkheid
Danish.verse 55:30: Welke van de gunsten van uw Heer wilt gij dan ontkennen
Danish.verse 55:31: Wij zullen spoedig met u afrekenen, o gij twee volkeren
Danish.verse 55:32: Welke van de gunsten van uw Heer wilt gij dan ontkennen
Danish.verse 55:33: O, groep van djinn en mensen; als gij de grenzen der hemelen en der aarde wilt overschrijden, probeert dit dan. Doch gij zult dit zonder gezag stellig niet kunnen doen
Danish.verse 55:34: Welke van de gunsten van uw Heer wilt gij dan ontkennen
Danish.verse 55:35: Er zullen vurige vlammen en gesmolten koper tegen u worden gezonden en gij zult u niet kunnen verweren
Danish.verse 55:36: Welke van de gunsten van uw Heer wilt gij dan ontkennen
Danish.verse 55:37: En wanneer de hemel uiteengespleten en rosssig wordt als een roodgeverfde huid
Danish.verse 55:38: Welke van de gunsten van uw Heer wilt gij dan ontkennen
Danish.verse 55:39: Op die Dag zullen mens noch djinn worden ondervraagd over hun zonden
Danish.verse 55:40: Welke van de gunsten van uw Heer wilt gij dan ontkennen
Danish.verse 55:41: De schuldigen zullen aan hun kenmerken worden herkend en zij zullen worden gegrepen bij haren en voeten
Danish.verse 55:42: Welke van de gunsten van uw Heer wilt gij dan ontkennen
Danish.verse 55:43: Dit is de hel door de schuldigen verloochend
Danish.verse 55:44: Zij zullen daar tussen vuur en fel kokend water rondgaan
Danish.verse 55:45: Welke van de gunsten van uw Heer wilt gij dan ontkennen
Danish.verse 55:46: Maar er zullen voor hem die het verschijnen voor zijn Heer vreest, twee tuinen zijn
Danish.verse 55:47: Welke van de gunsten van uw Heer wilt gij dan ontkennen
Danish.verse 55:49: Welke van de gunsten van uw Heer wilt gij dan ontkennen
Danish.verse 55:50: In beide zullen twee fonteinen stromen
Danish.verse 55:51: Welke van de gunsten van uw Heer wilt gij dan ontkennen
Danish.verse 55:52: Daarin zullen alle vruchten tweesoortig zijn
Danish.verse 55:53: Welke van de gunsten van uw Heer wilt gij dan ontkennen
Danish.verse 55:54: Zij zullen zich nedervlijen op divans met tapijten waarvan de voeringen van dikke zijde zullen zijn. En het fruit der tuinen zal dicht bij de hand liggen
Danish.verse 55:55: Welke van de gunsten van uw Heer wilt gij dan ontkennen
Danish.verse 55:56: Daarin zullen kuise meisjes zijn met zedige blik, door mens noch djinn ooit aangeraakt
Danish.verse 55:57: Welke van de gunsten van uw Heer wilt gij dan ontkennen
Danish.verse 55:58: Als waren zij robijnen en koralen
Danish.verse 55:59: Welke van de gunsten van uw Heer wilt gij dan ontkennen
Danish.verse 55:60: De beloning van goedheid kan niet anders dan goedheid zijn
Danish.verse 55:61: Welke van de gunsten van uw Heer wilt gij dan ontkennen
Danish.verse 55:62: En naast deze twee zijn er nog twee tuinen
Danish.verse 55:63: Welke van de gunsten van uw Heer wilt gij dan ontkennen
Danish.verse 55:65: Welke van de gunsten van uw Heer wilt gij dan ontkennen
Danish.verse 55:66: Daarin zullen ook twee bronnen zijn die water in overvloed spuiten
Danish.verse 55:67: Welke van de gunsten van uw Heer wilt gij dan ontkennen
Danish.verse 55:68: In beide zullen er vruchten, dadels en granaatappels zijn
Danish.verse 55:69: Welke van de gunsten van uw Heer wilt gij dan ontkennen
Danish.verse 55:70: Daarin zullen goede en schone meisjes zijn
Danish.verse 55:71: Welke van de gunsten van uw Heer wilt gij dan ontkennen
Danish.verse 55:73: Welke van de gunsten van uw Heer wilt gij dan ontkennen
Danish.verse 55:74: Die vóór hen mensen noch djinn hebben aangeraakt
Danish.verse 55:75: Welke van de gunsten van uw Heer wilt gij dan ontkennen
Danish.verse 55:76: Rustend op groene kussens en prachtige tapijten
Danish.verse 55:77: Welke van de gunsten van uw Heer wilt gij dan ontkennen
Danish.verse 55:78: Gezegend zij de naam van uw Heer, de Bezitter van Heerlijkheid en Eer

Dutch.verse 55:4: Hij heeft hem de duidelijke verklaring onderwezen.
Dutch.verse 55:5: De zon en de maan volgen de berekende banen.
Dutch.verse 55:6: En de struiken en de bomen knielen zich neer.
Dutch.verse 55:7: En Hij heeft de hemel opgeheven en Hij heeft de weegschaal geplaatst.
Dutch.verse 55:8: Opdat jullie het evenwicht niet verstoren.
Dutch.verse 55:9: En houdt de weegschaal in evenwicht met rechtvaardigheid en neemt niets van de weegschaal af.
Dutch.verse 55:10: En Hij heeft de aarde bereid voor de schepselen.
Dutch.verse 55:11: Daarop zijn vruchten en dadelpalmen met kolven.
Dutch.verse 55:12: En graan in aren en geurige planten.
Dutch.verse 55:13: Welke gunsten van jullie (Djinn's en mensen) Heer loochenen jullie dan?
Dutch.verse 55:14: Hij heeft de mens geschapen van droge klei, als aardewerk.
Dutch.verse 55:15: En Hij heeft de Djinn's geschapen van een rookloze vlam van vuur.
Dutch.verse 55:16: Welke gunsten van jullie Heer loochenen jullie dan?
Dutch.verse 55:17: De Heer van de twee opgangen en de twee ondergangen.
Dutch.verse 55:18: Welke gunsten van jullie Heer loochenen jullie dan?
Dutch.verse 55:19: Hij heeft de twee zeeën laten stromen en zij ontmoeten elkaar.
Dutch.verse 55:20: Tussen beide is een scheiding, zij kunnen die niet passeren.
Dutch.verse 55:21: Welke gunsten van jullie Heer loochenen jullie dan?
Dutch.verse 55:22: Uit beide komen parels en koraal voort.
Dutch.verse 55:23: Welke gunsten van jullie Heer loochenen jullie dan?
Dutch.verse 55:24: En aan Hem behoren de over de zee varende schepen, als bergen.
Dutch.verse 55:25: Welke gunsten van jullie Heer loochenen jullie dan?
Dutch.verse 55:26: Alles wat op aarde is zal vergaan.
Dutch.verse 55:27: En het Aangezicht van jouw Heer is blijvend, de Bezitter van Majesteit en Eer.
Dutch.verse 55:28: Welke gunsten van jullie Heer loochenen jullie dan?
Dutch.verse 55:29: Allen die in de hemelen en op de aarde zijn vragen Hem. Iedere dag is Hij bezig.
Dutch.verse 55:30: Welke gunsten van jullie Heer loochenen jullie dan?
Dutch.verse 55:31: Wij zullen voor jullie een afrekening maken, O jullie Djinn's en mensen!
Dutch.verse 55:32: Welke gunsten van jullie Heer loochenen jullie dan?
Dutch.verse 55:33: O verzameling van Djinn's en mensen, als jullie in staat zijn de hoeken van de hemelen en de aarde te verlaten, verlaat die dan, maar jullie zullen die slechts met een (grote) macht kunnen verlaten.
Dutch.verse 55:34: Welke gunsten van jullie Heer loochenen jullie dan?
Dutch.verse 55:35: Er zal een vlam van vuur en gesmolten koper tot jullie gezonden worden, waartegen jullie elkaar niet kunnen helpen.
Dutch.verse 55:36: Welke gunsten van jullie Heer loochenen jullie dan?
Dutch.verse 55:37: Wanneer dan de hemel is gespleten is zij rozenrood, als een geverfde huid.
Dutch.verse 55:38: Welke gunsten van jullie Heer loochenen jullie dan?
Dutch.verse 55:39: Op die Dag zullen de mensen en de Djinn's niet ondervraagd worden over hun zonden.
Dutch.verse 55:40: Welke gunsten van jullie Heer loochenen jullie dan?
Dutch.verse 55:41: De misdadigers zullen herkend worden aan hun kenmerken en daarna gegrepen worden bij het haar van het voorhoofd en de voeten.
Dutch.verse 55:42: Welke gunsten van jullie Heer loochenen jullie dan?
Dutch.verse 55:43: Dit is de Hel die de zondaren loochenden.
Dutch.verse 55:44: Zij dolen daar rond in het midden van kokend heet water.
Dutch.verse 55:45: Welke gunsten van jullie Heer loochenen jullie dan?
Dutch.verse 55:46: En voor wie vreesde voor het staan voor zijn Heer zijn er twee Tuinen (in het Paradijs).
Dutch.verse 55:47: Welke gunsten van jullie Heer loochenen jullie dan?
Dutch.verse 55:48: Beide met een overvloed aan takken en vruchten.
Dutch.verse 55:49: Welke gunsten van jullie Heer loochenen jullie dan?
Dutch.verse 55:50: In beide zijn twee stromende bronnen.
Dutch.verse 55:51: Welke gunsten van jullie Heer loochenen jullie dan?
Dutch.verse 55:52: In beide zijn er vruchten van elke soort, in paren.
Dutch.verse 55:53: Welke gunsten van jullie Heer loochenen jullie dan?
Dutch.verse 55:54: Leunend, op tapijten met brokaat aan hun binnenzijden en (de vruchten) van beide Tuinen hangen binnen handbereik.
Dutch.verse 55:55: Welke gunsten van jullie Heer loochenen jullie dan?
Dutch.verse 55:56: In de Tuinen bevinden zich schonen met ingetogen blikken, die geen mens en geen Djinn ooit vóór hen heeft aangeraakt.
Dutch.verse 55:57: Welke gunsten van jullie Heer loochenen jullie dan?
Dutch.verse 55:58: Als waren zij van robijn en koraal.
Dutch.verse 55:59: Welke gunsten van jullie Heer loochenen jullie dan?
Dutch.verse 55:60: Er is voor het verrichten van het goede geen andere beloning dan het goede.
Dutch.verse 55:61: Welke gunsten van jullie Heer loochenen jullie dan?
Dutch.verse 55:62: En naast deze twee zijn nog twee Tuinen.
Dutch.verse 55:63: Welke gunsten van jullie Heer loochenen jullie dan?
Dutch.verse 55:65: Welke gunsten van jullie Heer loochenen jullie dan?
Dutch.verse 55:66: In beide bevinden zich twee overvloedige bronnen.
Dutch.verse 55:67: Welke gunsten van jullie Heer loochenen jullie dan?
Dutch.verse 55:68: In beide zijn vruchten, dadels en granaatappels.
Dutch.verse 55:69: Welke gunsten van jullie Heer loochenen jullie dan?
Dutch.verse 55:70: Er in bevinden zich goede en mooie vrouwen.
Dutch.verse 55:71: Welke gunsten van jullie Heer loochenen jullie dan?
Dutch.verse 55:72: Vrouwen met prachtige ogen, afgezonderd in tentverblijven.
Dutch.verse 55:73: Welke gunsten van jullie Heer loochenen jullie dan?
Dutch.verse 55:74: Die geen mens en geen Djinn ooit vóór hen heeft aangeraakt.
Dutch.verse 55:75: Welke gunsten van jullie Heer loochenen jullie dan?
Dutch.verse 55:76: Leunend op groene kussens en op prachtige tapijten.
Dutch.verse 55:77: Welke gunsten van jullie Heer loochenen jullie dan?
Dutch.verse 55:78: Gezegend zij de Naam van jouw Heer, de Bezitter van Majesteit en Eer.

English.verse 55:5: The sun and the moon [move] by precise calculation,
English.verse 55:6: And the stars and trees prostrate.
English.verse 55:7: And the heaven He raised and imposed the balance
English.verse 55:8: That you not transgress within the balance.
English.verse 55:9: And establish weight in justice and do not make deficient the balance.
English.verse 55:10: And the earth He laid [out] for the creatures.
English.verse 55:11: Therein is fruit and palm trees having sheaths [of dates]
English.verse 55:12: And grain having husks and scented plants.
English.verse 55:13: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
English.verse 55:14: He created man from clay like [that of] pottery.
English.verse 55:15: And He created the jinn from a smokeless flame of fire.
English.verse 55:16: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
English.verse 55:17: [He is] Lord of the two sunrises and Lord of the two sunsets.
English.verse 55:18: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
English.verse 55:19: He released the two seas, meeting [side by side];
English.verse 55:20: Between them is a barrier [so] neither of them transgresses.
English.verse 55:21: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
English.verse 55:22: From both of them emerge pearl and coral.
English.verse 55:23: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
English.verse 55:24: And to Him belong the ships [with sails] elevated in the sea like mountains.
English.verse 55:25: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
English.verse 55:26: Everyone upon the earth will perish,
English.verse 55:27: And there will remain the Face of your Lord, Owner of Majesty and Honor.
English.verse 55:28: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
English.verse 55:29: Whoever is within the heavens and earth asks Him; every day He is bringing about a matter.
English.verse 55:30: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
English.verse 55:31: We will attend to you, O prominent beings.
English.verse 55:32: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
English.verse 55:33: O company of jinn and mankind, if you are able to pass beyond the regions of the heavens and the earth, then pass. You will not pass except by authority [from Allah].
English.verse 55:34: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
English.verse 55:35: There will be sent upon you a flame of fire and smoke, and you will not defend yourselves.
English.verse 55:36: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
English.verse 55:37: And when the heaven is split open and becomes rose-colored like oil -
English.verse 55:38: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -
English.verse 55:39: Then on that Day none will be asked about his sin among men or jinn.
English.verse 55:40: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
English.verse 55:41: The criminals will be known by their marks, and they will be seized by the forelocks and the feet.
English.verse 55:42: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
English.verse 55:43: This is Hell, which the criminals deny.
English.verse 55:44: They will go around between it and scalding water, heated [to the utmost degree].
English.verse 55:45: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
English.verse 55:46: But for he who has feared the position of his Lord are two gardens -
English.verse 55:47: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -
English.verse 55:49: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
English.verse 55:50: In both of them are two springs, flowing.
English.verse 55:51: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
English.verse 55:52: In both of them are of every fruit, two kinds.
English.verse 55:53: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
English.verse 55:54: [They are] reclining on beds whose linings are of silk brocade, and the fruit of the two gardens is hanging low.
English.verse 55:55: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
English.verse 55:56: In them are women limiting [their] glances, untouched before them by man or jinni -
English.verse 55:57: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -
English.verse 55:58: As if they were rubies and coral.
English.verse 55:59: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
English.verse 55:60: Is the reward for good [anything] but good?
English.verse 55:61: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
English.verse 55:62: And below them both [in excellence] are two [other] gardens -
English.verse 55:63: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -
English.verse 55:65: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
English.verse 55:66: In both of them are two springs, spouting.
English.verse 55:67: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
English.verse 55:68: In both of them are fruit and palm trees and pomegranates.
English.verse 55:69: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
English.verse 55:70: In them are good and beautiful women -
English.verse 55:71: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -
English.verse 55:73: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -
English.verse 55:74: Untouched before them by man or jinni -
English.verse 55:75: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -
English.verse 55:76: Reclining on green cushions and beautiful fine carpets.
English.verse 55:77: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
English.verse 55:78: Blessed is the name of your Lord, Owner of Majesty and Honor.

Filipino.verse 55:2: Siya na nagturo (sa inyo O Sangkatauhan) ng Qur’an (sa pamamagitan ng Kanyang Habag)
Filipino.verse 55:4: Siya na nagturo sa kanya ng maindayog na pananalita
Filipino.verse 55:5: Ang araw at buwan ay tumatakbo (sumusunod) sa kanilang takdang landas (ng buong katumpakan sa oras at sukat)
Filipino.verse 55:6: Ang mga bituin at mga punongkahoy ay kapwa nagpapatirapa sa pagpupuri
Filipino.verse 55:7: At ang kalangitan ay Kanyang itinaas nang matayog, at Kanyang itinakda ang Timbangan (ng katarungan)
Filipino.verse 55:8: Upang kayo ay hindi magmalabis sa hangganan (at sukat)
Filipino.verse 55:9: Kaya’t panatilihin ninyo ang bigat ng may katarungan at huwag ninyong bayaan ang timbangan na magkulang
Filipino.verse 55:10: At Siya ang naglatag ng kalupaan para sa kanyang mga nilikha
Filipino.verse 55:11: Na naririto ang mga bungangkahoy at mga palmera (datiles) na namumunga sa maraming buwig
Filipino.verse 55:12: At gayundin ang mais, ang (kanyang) dahon at tangkay ay bilang pagkain ng mga hayop, at mababangong halaman (herba)
Filipino.verse 55:13: Kaya’t alin sa mga kaloob ng inyong Panginoon ang inyong itinatatwa (O mga Jinn at Tao)
Filipino.verse 55:14: Nilikha Niya ang tao (Adan) mula sa malambot na putik na tulad (ng gamit) sa palayukan
Filipino.verse 55:15: At nilikha Niya ang mga Jinn mula sa apoy na walang usok
Filipino.verse 55:16: Kaya’t alin sa mga kaloob ng inyong Panginoon ang inyong itinatatwa (O mga Jinn at Tao)
Filipino.verse 55:17: (Siya ang) Panginoon ng dalawang Silangan (ang lugar ng pagsikat ng araw sa panahon ng Tag-init at Taglamig), at Panginoon ng dalawang Kanluran (ang lugar ng paglubog ng araw sa panahon ng Tag-init at Taglamig)
Filipino.verse 55:18: Kaya’t alin sa mga kaloob ng inyong Panginoon ang inyong itinatatwa (O mga Jinn at Tao)
Filipino.verse 55:19: Hinayaan Niya na maging malaya ang dalawang bahagi ng dagat (ang maalat at matabang na tubig); na huwag magkatagpo
Filipino.verse 55:20: Na sa pagitan nila ay may isang sagka at sila ay hindi magsasanib (sa isa’t isa)
Filipino.verse 55:21: Kaya’t alin sa mga kaloob na ito ng inyong Panginoon ang inyong itinatatwa (O mga Jinn at Tao)
Filipino.verse 55:22: Na rito (sa dagat) ay nagmumula ang mga perlas at batong bulaklak
Filipino.verse 55:23: Kaya’t alin sa mga kaloob na ito ng inyong Panginoon ang inyong itinatatwa (O mga Jinn at Tao)
Filipino.verse 55:24: At nasa Kanyang (pag-aaruga) ang mga barko na naglalayag nang mabilis sa karagatan, na matayog na tulad ng mga bundok
Filipino.verse 55:25: Kaya’t alin sa mga kaloob na ito ng inyong Panginoon ang inyong itinatatwa (O mga Jinn at Tao)
Filipino.verse 55:26: Ang lahat ng anupamang nasa kalupaan ay maglalaho
Filipino.verse 55:27: Datapuwa’t mananatili (magpakailanman) ang Mukha ng iyong Panginoon na Tigib ng Kaluwalhatian, Kasaganaan at Karangalan
Filipino.verse 55:28: Kaya’t alin sa mga kaloob na ito ng inyong Panginoon ang inyong itinatatwa (O mga Jinn at Tao)
Filipino.verse 55:29: Ang bawat nilalang dito sa kalangitan at kalupaan ay sa Kanya humahanap ng kanilang pangangailangan. At sa araw-araw, Siya ang nagpapatupad (ng pansantinakpang) kapangyarihan (katulad ng pagbibigay ng karangalan sa ilan, kahihiyan sa iba, buhay sa ilan, kamatayan sa iba, atbp)
Filipino.verse 55:30: Kaya’t alin sa mga kaloob na ito ng inyong Panginoon ang inyong itinatatwa (O mga Jinn at Tao)
Filipino.verse 55:31: Hindi maglalaon ay Aming igagawad (ang inyong kahihinatnan), o kayong dalawang uri ng nilalang (mga Jinn at Tao)
Filipino.verse 55:32: Kaya’t alin sa mga kaloob na ito ng inyong Panginoon ang inyong itinatatwa (O mga Jinn at Tao)
Filipino.verse 55:33: O kayong kalipunan ng mga Jinn at Tao! Kung kayo ay may kapangyarihan upang sulasugin ang mga hangganan (at lahat ng sulok) ng kalangitan at kalupaan, kung gayon ay inyong sulasugin! Datapuwa’t hindi kayo makakatawid doon malibang Aming (Allah) pahintulutan
Filipino.verse 55:34: Kaya’t alin sa mga kaloob na ito ng inyong Panginoon ang inyong itinatatwa (O mga Jinn at Tao)
Filipino.verse 55:35: At sa inyong dalawa (mga Jinn at Tao) ay ipapadala (sa inyong masasama) ang walang usok na lagablab ng apoy (upang tumupok) at ng (lusaw) na tanso, at kayo ay hindi makakapananggalang sa inyong sarili
Filipino.verse 55:36: Kaya’t alin sa mga kaloob na ito ng inyong Panginoon ang inyong itinatatwa (O mga Jinn at Tao)
Filipino.verse 55:37: At kung ang kalangitan ay mahati sa pagkapunit, at yaon ay maging pula na tila pamahid (na tunaw)
Filipino.verse 55:38: Kaya’t alin sa mga kaloob na ito ang inyong Panginoon ang inyong itinatatwa (O mga Jinn at Tao)
Filipino.verse 55:39: Sa Araw na yaon, ang Tao maging ang Jinn ay hindi tatanungin sa kanyang kasalanan (sapagkat ito ay natukoy na sa kulay ng kanilang mukha, kung ito ay itim o puti)
Filipino.verse 55:40: Kaya’t alin sa mga kaloob na ito ng inyong Panginoon ang inyong itinatatwa (o mga Jinn at Tao)
Filipino.verse 55:41: Ang Mujrimun (mga makasalanan, walang pananalig, mapagsamba sa diyus-diyosan, kriminal, tampalasan, buktot, atbp.) ay makikilala sa kanilang mga tanda (maiitim na mukha), at sila ay sasakmalin sa kanilang nakalawit at natataliang buhok (sa noo) at sa kanilang mga paa
Filipino.verse 55:42: Kaya’t alin sa mga kaloob na ito ng inyong Panginoon ang inyong itinatatwa (O mga Jinn at Tao)
Filipino.verse 55:43: Ito ang Impiyerno na itinanggi ng Mujrimun (mga makasalanan, walang pananalig, mapagsamba sa diyus-diyosan, kriminal, tampalasan, buktot, atbp)
Filipino.verse 55:44: Sila ay magsisiikot sa pagitan (ng Impiyerno), sa gitna ng mainit at kumukulong tubig
Filipino.verse 55:45: Kaya’t alin sa mga kaloob na ito ng inyong Panginoon ang inyong itinatatwa (O mga Jinn at Tao)
Filipino.verse 55:46: Datapuwa’tsiya(natunaynasumasampalatayakayAllah at sa Kanyang Kaisahan at sa Islam, na gumagawa ng lahat ng mga ipinag-uutos ni Allah at ng Kanyang Tagapagbalita at umiiwas sa lahat ng masama at mga ipinagbabawal sa Islam), na may pagkatakot (at pangangamba) sa pagtindig sa harapan (ng Luklukan ng Paghuhukom) ng kanyang Panginoon, doon ay magkakaroon ng dalawang Halamanan (Paraiso)
Filipino.verse 55:47: Kaya’t alin sa mga kaloob na ito ng inyong Panginoon ang inyong itinatatwa (O mga Jinn at Tao)
Filipino.verse 55:48: Na may malalabay na mga sanga (ng lahat ng uri ng mga punongkahoy)
Filipino.verse 55:49: Kaya’t alin sa mga kaloob na ito ng inyong Panginoon ang inyong itinatatwa (O mga Jinn at Tao)
Filipino.verse 55:50: At sa pagitan nito (Halamanan) ay mayroong dalawang Batis na malayang dumadaloy
Filipino.verse 55:51: Kaya’t alin sa mga kaloob na ito ng inyong Panginoon ang inyong itinatatwa (O mga Jinn at Tao)
Filipino.verse 55:52: At naroroon ang lahat ng uri ng bungangkahoy sa bawat pares
Filipino.verse 55:53: Kaya’t alin sa mga kaloob na ito ng inyong Panginoon ang inyong itinatatwa (O mga Jinn at Tao)
Filipino.verse 55:54: Sila ay magsisihilig sa mga diban na nababalutan ng binurdahang sutla, at ang mga bungangkahoy ng dalawang Halamanan ay mababa at naaabot ng kamay
Filipino.verse 55:55: Kaya’t alin sa mga kaloob na ito ng inyong Panginoon ang inyong itinatatwa (O mga Jinn at Tao)
Filipino.verse 55:56: At sasakanila ang (mga dalaga) na walang bahid dungis, na nagpipigil sa kanilang pagsulyap sa kanilang mga asawa, na wala pang sinumang tao o Jinn ang sa kanila ay nakasaling
Filipino.verse 55:57: Kaya’t alin sa mga kaloob na ito ng inyong Panginoon ang inyong itinatatwa (O mga Jinn at Tao)
Filipino.verse 55:58: (Na ang kagandahan) ay nawawangis sa mga batong rubi at batong bulaklak
Filipino.verse 55:59: Kaya’t alin sa mga kaloob na ito ng inyong Panginoon ang inyong itinatatwa (O mga Jinn at Tao)
Filipino.verse 55:60: Mayroon pa bang ibang ganti ang kabutihan maliban sa kabutihan
Filipino.verse 55:61: Kaya’t alin sa mga kaloob na ito ng inyong Panginoon ang inyong itinatatwa (O mga Jinn at Tao)
Filipino.verse 55:62: At bukod pa sa dalawang (Halamanang ito) ay mayroon pang dalawang Halamanan (alalaong baga, ang Paraiso)
Filipino.verse 55:63: Kaya’t alin sa mga kaloob na ito ng inyong Panginoon ang inyong itinatatwa (O mga Jinn at Tao)
Filipino.verse 55:64: Na luntiang- luntian ang kanyang kulay (dahilan sa saganang tubig)
Filipino.verse 55:65: Kaya’t alin sa mga kaloob na ito ng inyong Panginoon ang inyong itinatatwa (O mga Jinn at Tao)
Filipino.verse 55:66: At sa bawat (Halamanan) ay may dalawang batis na sagana at patuloy na umaagos na tubig
Filipino.verse 55:67: Kaya’t alin sa mga kaloob na ito ng inyong Panginoon ang inyong itinatatwa (o mga Jinn at Tao)
Filipino.verse 55:68: Na naroroon ang mga bungangkahoy, at mga bungang palmera (datiles) at bungang granada (pomegrenates)
Filipino.verse 55:69: Kaya’t alin sa mga kaloob na ito ng inyong Panginoon ang inyong itinatatwa (O mga Jinn at Tao)
Filipino.verse 55:70: At (sa Halamanan) ay sasakanila ang (mga asawa) na mainam at maganda
Filipino.verse 55:71: Kaya’t alin sa mga kaloob na ito ng inyong Panginoon ang inyong itinatatwa (O mga Jinn at Tao)
Filipino.verse 55:72: Mga Houris (magaganda at mapuputing babae na nagpipigil sa kanilang pagsulyap) na nakatahan sa mga bulwagan
Filipino.verse 55:73: Kaya’t alin sa mga kaloob na ito ng inyong Panginoon ang inyong itinatatwa (O mga Jinn at Tao)
Filipino.verse 55:74: Na wala pang sinumang tao o Jinn ang sa kanila ay nakasaling
Filipino.verse 55:75: Kaya’t alin sa mga kaloob na ito ng inyong Panginoon ang inyong itinatatwa (O mga Jinn at Tao)
Filipino.verse 55:76: Na nakahilig sa mga luntiang diban at mga karpetang tigib sa kagandahan
Filipino.verse 55:77: Kaya’t alin sa mga kaloob na ito ng inyong Panginoon ang inyong itinatatwa (O mga Jinn at Tao)
Filipino.verse 55:78: Maluwalhati ang Pangalan ng inyong Panginoon (Allah), na Lubos ang Kataasan at Tigib ng Karangalan

French.verse 55:4: Il lui a appris à s'exprimer clairement.
French.verse 55:5: Le soleil et la lune [évoluent] selon un calcul [minutieux].
French.verse 55:6: Et l'herbe et les arbres se prosternent.
French.verse 55:7: Et quant au ciel, Il l'a élevé bien haut. Et Il a établi la balance,
French.verse 55:8: afin que vous ne transgressiez pas dans la pesée:
French.verse 55:9: Donnez [toujours] le poids exact et ne faussez pas la pesée.
French.verse 55:10: Quant à la terre, Il l'a étendue pour les êtres vivants:
French.verse 55:11: il s'y trouve des fruits, et aussi les palmiers aux fruits recouverts d'enveloppes,
French.verse 55:12: tout comme les grains dans leurs balles, et les plantes aromatiques.
French.verse 55:13: Lequel donc des bienfaits de votre Seigneur nierez-vous?
French.verse 55:14: Il a crée l'homme d'argile sonnante comme la poterie;
French.verse 55:15: et Il a créé les djinns de la flamme d'un feu sans fumée.
French.verse 55:16: Lequel donc des bienfaits de votre Seigneur nierez-vous?
French.verse 55:17: Seigneur des deux Levants et Seigneur des deux Couchants!
French.verse 55:18: Lequel donc des bienfaits de votre Seigneur nierez-vous?
French.verse 55:19: Il a donné libre cours aux deux mers pour se rencontrer;
French.verse 55:20: il y a entre elles une barrière qu'elles ne dépassent pas.
French.verse 55:21: Lequel donc des bienfaits de votre Seigneur nierez-vous?
French.verse 55:22: De ces deux [mers] sortent la perle et le corail.
French.verse 55:23: Lequel donc des bienfaits de votre Seigneur nierez-vous?
French.verse 55:24: A Lui appartiennent les vaisseaux élevés sur la mer comme des montagnes.
French.verse 55:25: Lequel donc des bienfaits de votre Seigneur nierez-vous?
French.verse 55:26: Tout ce qui est sur elle [la terre] doit disparaître,
French.verse 55:27: [Seule] subsistera La Face [Wajh] de ton Seigneur, plein de majesté et de noblesse.
French.verse 55:28: Lequel donc des bienfaits de votre Seigneur nierez-vous?
French.verse 55:29: Ceux qui sont dans les cieux et la terre L'implorent. Chaque jour, Il accomplit une œuvre nouvelle.
French.verse 55:30: Lequel donc des bienfaits de votre Seigneur nierez-vous?
French.verse 55:31: Nous allons bientôt entreprendre votre jugement, ô vous les deux charges [hommes et djinns].
French.verse 55:32: Lequel donc des bienfaits de votre Seigneur nierez-vous?
French.verse 55:33: O peuple de djinns et d'hommes! Si vous pouvez sortir du domaine des cieux et de la terre, alors faites-le. Mais vous ne pourrez en sortir qu'à l'aide d'un pouvoir [illimité].
French.verse 55:34: Lequel donc des bienfaits de votre Seigneur nierez-vous?
French.verse 55:35: Il sera lancé contre vous un jet de feu et de fumée [ou de cuivre fondu], et vous ne serez pas secourus.
French.verse 55:36: Lequel donc des bienfaits de votre Seigneur nierez-vous?
French.verse 55:37: Puis quand le ciel se fendra et deviendra alors écarlate comme le cuir rouge.
French.verse 55:38: Lequel des bienfaits de votre Seigneur nierez-vous?
French.verse 55:39: Alors, ni aux hommes ni aux djinns, on ne posera des questions à propos de leurs péchés.
French.verse 55:40: Lequel donc des bienfaits de votre Seigneur nierez-vous?
French.verse 55:41: On reconnaîtra les criminels à leurs traits. Ils seront donc saisis par les toupets et les pieds.
French.verse 55:42: Lequel donc des bienfaits de votre Seigneur nierez-vous?
French.verse 55:43: Voilà l'Enfer que les criminels traitaient de mensonge.
French.verse 55:44: Ils feront le va-et-vient entre lui (l'Enfer) et une eau bouillante extrêmement chaude.
French.verse 55:45: Lequel donc des bienfaits de votre Seigneur nierez-vous?
French.verse 55:46: Et pour celui qui aura craint de comparaître devant son Seigneur, il y aura deux jardins;
French.verse 55:47: Lequel donc des bienfaits de votre Seigneur nierez-vous?
French.verse 55:49: Lequel donc des bienfaits de votre Seigneur nierez-vous?
French.verse 55:50: Ils y trouveront deux sources courantes.
French.verse 55:51: Lequel donc des bienfaits de votre Seigneur nierez-vous?
French.verse 55:52: Ils contiennent deux espèces de chaque fruit.
French.verse 55:53: Lequel donc des bienfaits de votre Seigneur nierez-vous?
French.verse 55:54: Ils seront accoudés sur des tapis doublés de brocart, et les fruits des deux jardins seront à leur portée (pour être cueillis).
French.verse 55:55: Lequel donc des bienfaits de votre Seigneur nierez-vous?
French.verse 55:56: Ils y trouveront [les houris] aux regards chastes, qu'avant eux aucun homme ou djinn n'aura déflorées.
French.verse 55:57: Lequel donc des bienfaits de votre Seigneur nierez-vous?
French.verse 55:58: Elles seront [aussi belles] que le rubis et le corail.
French.verse 55:59: Lequel donc des bienfaits de votre Seigneur nierez-vous?
French.verse 55:60: Y a-t-il d'autre récompense pour le bien, que le bien?
French.verse 55:61: Lequel donc des bienfaits de votre Seigneur nierez-vous?
French.verse 55:62: En deçà de ces deux jardins il y aura deux autres jardins.
French.verse 55:63: Lequel donc des bienfaits de votre Seigneur nierez-vous?
French.verse 55:65: Lequel donc des bienfaits de votre Seigneur nierez-vous?
French.verse 55:66: Dans lesquelles il y aura deux sources jaillissantes.
French.verse 55:67: Lequel donc des bienfaits de votre Seigneur nierez-vous?
French.verse 55:68: Ils contiennent des fruits, des palmiers, et des grenadiers.
French.verse 55:69: Lequel donc des bienfaits de votre Seigneur nierez-vous?
French.verse 55:70: Là, il y aura des vertueuses et des belles.
French.verse 55:71: Lequel donc des bienfaits de votre Seigneur nierez-vous?
French.verse 55:72: Des houris cloîtrées dans les tentes,
French.verse 55:73: Lequel donc des bienfaits de votre Seigneur nierez-vous?
French.verse 55:74: qu'avant eux aucun homme ou djinn n'a déflorées.
French.verse 55:75: Lequel donc des bienfaits de votre Seigneur nierez-vous?
French.verse 55:76: Ils seront accoudés sur des coussins verts et des tapis épais et jolis.
French.verse 55:77: Lequel donc des bienfaits de votre Seigneur nierez-vous?
French.verse 55:78: Béni soit le Nom de ton Seigneur, Plein de Majesté et de Munificence!

Fulah.verse 55:5: Naange ngen e lewru ndun [hino dogira] limoore
Fulah.verse 55:6: koode ɗen kadi e leɗɗe ɗen, hino sujjude
Fulah.verse 55:7: Kammu ngun, O toownu ngu. O waɗi nunɗal ngal
Fulah.verse 55:8: fii wata on bewu ka peesirɗe
Fulah.verse 55:9: Ñinniron etugol ngol no nunɗiri. Wata on ɗuytu peesirɗe ɗen
Fulah.verse 55:10: Leydi ndin, O waɗanndi tagoore nden
Fulah.verse 55:11: muuyanteeɗi hino e mayri, e leɗɗe tamaro marɗe poƴƴi
Fulah.verse 55:12: e gabbe marɗe ñaande, e uurngol
Fulah.verse 55:13: E ko honɗi e neemaaji Joomi mon ɗin woni ko fennoton
Fulah.verse 55:14: O tagiri neɗɗo on immorde e loopal, wa’ungal wa ko juɗaa
Fulah.verse 55:15: O tagiri jinnaaji ɗin, immorde e lew lewndu yiite laaɓuki
Fulah.verse 55:16: E ko honɗi e neemaaji Joomi mon ɗin yeddoton
Fulah.verse 55:17: Jeyɗo fuɗirɗe ɗen ɗiɗi Jeyi kadi mutirɗe ɗen ɗiɗi
Fulah.verse 55:18: E ko honɗi e neemaaji Joomi mon ɗin yeddoton
Fulah.verse 55:19: O Tuppindiri maaje ɗen ɗiɗi, hiɗe fotta
Fulah.verse 55:20: heedo hino hakkunde majje, ɗe jillondirtaa
Fulah.verse 55:21: E ko honɗi e neemaaji Joomi mon ɗin yeddoton
Fulah.verse 55:22: Hino yalta e ɗen [maaje] ɗiɗi: kaŋŋe "Lu’lu’u" e "Marjaan
Fulah.verse 55:23: E ko honɗi e neemaaji Joomi mon ɗin yeddoton
Fulah.verse 55:24: Ko Kanko woodani dogooje lesaaɗe ka nder maayo, wa’uɗe wa pelle
Fulah.verse 55:25: E ko honɗi e neemaaji Joomi mon ɗin yeddoton
Fulah.verse 55:26: Kala ko woni e hoore mayri ko ko re’ata
Fulah.verse 55:27: heddoo Jaati Joomi maa Kin, Jom mawngu e teddungal. @Corrected
Fulah.verse 55:28: E ko honɗi e neemaaji Joomi mon ɗin yeddoton
Fulah.verse 55:29: Ɓen wonɓe ka kammuuli e ka leydi hino naamnoo Mo. Ñalnde woo, Himo e fiyaaku
Fulah.verse 55:30: E ko honɗi e neemaaji Joomi mon ɗin yeddoton
Fulah.verse 55:31: Aray nde Men faandii hasbude on, onon yo tedda ko`e en ɗiɗo
Fulah.verse 55:32: E ko honɗi e neemaaji Joomi mon ɗin yeddoton
Fulah.verse 55:33: Ko onon yo dental jinna e yimɓe ! Si on hattanii wuɗɗirgol ka seraaji kammuuli e ka leydi, haray wuɗɗee. On wuɗɗirtaa si wanaa e doole
Fulah.verse 55:34: E ko honɗi e neemaaji Joomi mon ɗin yeddoton
Fulah.verse 55:35: Hino wurtee e mon - [onon jinna e yimɓe] - ɗemngal yiite e curki [maa sila taayuɗo], on faabondirtaa
Fulah.verse 55:36: E ko honɗi e neemaaji Joomi mon ɗin yeddoton
Fulah.verse 55:37: Si wonii kammu ngun seekike, ngu wojjirii wa piindi hono pentiir boɗe
Fulah.verse 55:38: E ko honɗi e neemaaji Joomi mon ɗin yeddoton
Fulah.verse 55:39: Nden ñalnde, wanaa neɗɗo maa jinne woni ko lanmditetee fii junuubi mun
Fulah.verse 55:40: E ko honɗi e neemaaji Joomi mon ɗin yeddoton
Fulah.verse 55:41: Bomɓe ɓen hino annditiree maandeeji maɓɓe ɗin. Ɓe nanngiroyee ka njubuuji-tin tinɗi- e ka koyɗe
Fulah.verse 55:42: E ko honɗi e neemaaji Joomi mon ɗin woni ko fennoton
Fulah.verse 55:43: Ko ngee woni Jahannama nge bomɓe ɓen fennaynoo fii mun
Fulah.verse 55:44: Hiɓe wanngoo hakkunde magge e fatayɗam hattuɗam wulde
Fulah.verse 55:45: E ko honɗi e neemaaji Joomi mon ɗin yeddoton
Fulah.verse 55:46: Hino woodani kala hulɗo daragol yeeso Joomi mun, aljannaaji ɗiɗi
Fulah.verse 55:47: E ko honɗi e neemaaji Joomi mon ɗin yeddoton
Fulah.verse 55:49: E ko honɗi e neemaaji Joomi mon ɗin yeddoton
Fulah.verse 55:50: Ɓulli ɗiɗi hino e nder majji, ilayɗi. @Corrected
